|                    |• System start-up                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Shutdown                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Monitoring                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Recovery and restart                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal processing controls                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Archiving and application security.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |User documentation must explain in detail how to execute available functionality in each application component |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and must cover instructions for the following:                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Access procedures                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• User screen layout                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Standard report layout and content                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction entry                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Workflow                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Batch job initiation                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• General ledger and transaction maintenance                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Year-end processing                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Error codes with descriptions                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Recovery steps                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Troubleshooting procedures.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The system must be delivered with system operations and user manuals. Documentation must explain the following |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |system operations:                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System start-up                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Shutdown                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Monitoring                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Recovery and restart                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal processing controls                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Archiving and application security.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |User documentation must explain in detail how to execute available functionality in each application component |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and must cover instructions for the following:                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Access procedures                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• User screen layout                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Standard report layout and content                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction entry                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Workflow                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Batch job initiation                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• General ledger and transaction maintenance                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Year-end processing                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Error codes with descriptions                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Recovery steps                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Troubleshooting procedures.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-10-05            |The system must be delivered with electronic and hard-copy documentation updates concurrent with the           |FSIO, TLK-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |distribution of new software releases. Release notes must clearly identify all changes made to the system’s    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |functionality, operation, or required computing hardware and software.                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11: System Performance                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                      |
|TC-11-01            |The system must process the agency’s specified accounting workload without adversely impacting projected online|FSIO, TLL-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |response times.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11-02            |The system must process scheduled work (e.g., batch jobs) within an agency-specified batch-processing window.  |FSIO, TLL-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Scheduled work can include the following:                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Daily system assurance reports                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Daily backups                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Daily interface processing                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• General ledger posting                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Table updates                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Standard reporting.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11-03            |The system must maintain the agency’s specified current and historical financial data (e.g., general ledger    |FSIO, TLL-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |records, documents, transactions, lines, and vendor records) storage needs with no degradation to online or    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |batch processing performance.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11-04            |The system must support concurrent access to functional modules for the agency’s specified user community.     |FSIO, TLL-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11-05            |The system must be delivered with computing performance metrics for platforms and systems environments on which|FSIO, TLL-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the application is certified to run. Performance metrics provided by the vendor should describe the following: |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction processing throughput capacity                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Expected workstation client response time by transaction type                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Data storage capacity                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Limitations on concurrent user connectivity.                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Maximum number of concurrent users                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Number of transactions, processing windows, and volume of agency information expected to be maintained online|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |or archived                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Average response time for user requests                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Request capacity or throughput  that the system must support (the rate at which transactions are processed by|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the system)                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Peak load                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Peak period                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Intensity level                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|TC-11-06                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|TC-12-01                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|SM-01-01            |The system must provide the capability to maintain an accounting classification structure that includes the    |FSIO, SMA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |following elements, as described in both OMB and Treasury guidance:                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• TAS                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal fund                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Agency                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Bureau                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal organization                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Strategic goal/strategic goal extension                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Program                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Project                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Governmentwide project                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Line of business subfunction                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• USSGL account/USSGL account extension                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• USSGL account attributes                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting period                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Object class/object class extension                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Revenue source                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Business event type                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• ALC                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cost center                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Activity.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The system must maintain each classification element independently.                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-02            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain at least five agency mission-specific         |FSIO, SMA-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting classification data elements in conformity with OMB and Treasury guidance.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-03            |The system must classify transactions by any element of the accounting classification structure, including any |FSIO, SMA-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of the five agency mission-specific classification elements.                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-04            |The system must allow a qualified end user to maintain accounting classification elements without the need to  |FSIO, SMA-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |request technical support.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that controls the use of accounting classification elements by |FSIO, SMA-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |validity period. In other words, the system must activate or deactivate accounting classification changes based|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |on start and end dates (effective period or validity period) during which each element will be available for   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |use.                                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-06            |The system must allow for the entry, import, retrieval, summarization, and reporting of a TAS structure that   |FSIO, SMA-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |includes the following components defined by Treasury and OMB:                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sublevel prefix                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Allocation transfer agency identifier                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Agency identifier                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Beginning period of availability                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Ending period of availability                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Main account code                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Subaccount code.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-07            |The system must provide the capability to establish additional (lower) levels of hierarchical accounting       |FSIO, SMA-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |structure data elements, such as internal organization, program, project, object class/object class extension, |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and cost center (e.g., establish parent-child relationships with the ability to summarize, distribute funds,   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and report data at all defined levels).                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-08            |The system must provide the automated capability to maintain an accounting classification structure and related|FSIO, SMA-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |data relationships as prescribed in OMB and Treasury guidance for common governmentwide and agency-specific    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |data relationships, including the following:                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• TAS to multiple internal funds                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal fund to multiple USSGL attributes and fund attributes                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Program to multiple USSGL attributes, internal funds, projects, organizations, or activities                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Strategic goal to multiple programs and projects.                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-09            |The system must maintain an object class structure consistent with the standard object class codes defined in  |FSIO, SMA-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |OMB Circular No. A-11 and for the lower level agency-specific object class extension codes permitted by OMB and|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Treasury guidance.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-10            |The system must be delivered pre-populated with the object classification codes specified in OMB Circular No.  |FSIO, SMA-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |A-11.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-11            |The system must provide the automated capability to load governmentwide (e.g., Treasury, OMB) and              |FSIO, SMA-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-specific classification elements.                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-12            |The system must provide automated capability to derive accounting classification element values based on       |FSIO, SMA-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-defined data relationships or business rules.                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-13            |The system must provide the capability to derive USSGL account attributes used to classify accounting          |FSIO, SMA-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions for reporting to Treasury systems (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, and GTAS) from the internal fund|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |code, including, at a minimum, apportionment category, BEA category, borrowing source, budget function or      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |subfunction, custodial or noncustodial, definite or indefinite, direct or reimbursable, and exchange or        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |nonexchange.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-14            |The system must provide the capability to link a fund origination year to an internal fund.                    |FSIO, SMA-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-01-15            |The system must have the capability to record additional reporting attributes outside the line of accounting in|NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |order to capture reference information and/or details at the lowest transaction level.                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02: Document and Transaction Control                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|SM-02-01            |The system must capture a unique system-generated or agency-assigned document number for each document and     |FSIO, SMB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document modification.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-02            |The system must capture a unique system-generated number to identify each general ledger transaction, and it   |FSIO, SMB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must associate one or more general ledger transactions with a document and document modifications.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-03            |The system must provide automated capability to link referenced documents in the processing chain, including   |FSIO, SMB-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |purchasing (or spending chain) documents. For example, when an obligation document references multiple         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |commitment documents, that obligation must remain linked to each commitment document.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-04            |The system must provide the capability to inextricably link financial management transactions to related       |FSIO, SMB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reimbursable agreements, while maintaining traceability to the associated source documents, including purchase |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |requisitions, contracts, delivery orders, task orders, purchase orders, BPAs, grants, and travel orders.       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-05            |The system must provide automated internal control functionality designed to do the following:• Prevent the    |FSIO, SMB-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |entry of duplicate documents• Identify potential duplicate documents• Correct duplications.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-06            |The system must capture the source system identifier and the source system unique document number (or other    |FSIO, SMB-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |unique identifier) of each interfaced or converted document.                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-07            |The system must capture goods delivery and service performance period start and end dates at the document and  |FSIO, SMB-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document line level on documents where the period of performance is a validation for future processing, such as|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the following:                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Spending documents                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Contracts                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• BPAs                                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reimbursable agreements                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Grants.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-08            |The system must provide automated functionality to define and maintain funds control edits and tolerance checks|FSIO, SMB-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(on variances in document quantity or dollar amount) as one of the following:                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Rejection                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Warning (override authority needed to post transaction)                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Information only (no override needed).                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-09            |The system must provide the capability to prevent the recording of erroneous transactions by rejecting         |FSIO, SMB-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |documents that fail transaction processing validity checks (e.g., edits) or lack required verifications.       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-10            |The system must provide automated functionality that notifies the user when online documents fail funds control|FSIO, SMB-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |edits, transaction processing edits, or tolerance checks. The system must provide the notification on the      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document entry screen and include the nature of each error and the validation edit (rejection, warning, or     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |information only). The system must retain errors with the document until they have been resolved.              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-11            |The system must provide the capability to suspend documents that fail transaction processing edits, funds      |FSIO, SMB-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |control edits, or tolerance checks.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-12            |The system must provide the capability to allow users to hold documents for completion or processing at a later|FSIO, SMB-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |date and to segregate held documents from suspended documents.                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-13            |The system must provide the capability to reprocess suspended documents when external referenced data that     |FSIO, SMB-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |caused the system to suspend processing of a document is corrected (e.g., when a vendor’s CCR status changes   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |from expired to active).                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-14            |The system must provide automated functionality that allows users to select suspended and held documents for   |FSIO, SMB-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |continued processing.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-15            |The system must provide automated functionality that allows users to cancel (reverse) posted documents,        |FSIO, SMB-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |including all associated general ledger transactions and system table updates (e.g., funds availability        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |updates.)                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-16            |The system must provide the capability to allow users to delete unposted documents in a held or suspended      |FSIO, SMB-18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |status.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-17            |The system must provide the capability to establish tolerances for both quantity and dollar amounts at the     |FSIO, SMB-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document line level in percentages and/or “not-to-exceed” amounts, and the system must use tolerances to       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |validate against variations in both quantity and dollar amounts at the document line level for the following   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |relationships:                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Obligations to commitments                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Receipts to obligations                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment requests to obligations.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-18            |The system must provide the capability to define dollar and quantity tolerances by type of obligation or for   |FSIO, SMB-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |all obligations independent of their obligation type.                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-19            |The system must capture the following accounting line detail on all documents:                                 |FSIO, SMB-21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Line number                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Line amount                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Line accounting classification information.                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-20            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain acquisition data elements and values,         |FSIO, SMB-22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |including the following:                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• NAICS business codes                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• SIC codes                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Product and service codes                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• FOB shipping points                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Ship to locations (destination codes).                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-21            |The system must provide the capability to validate acquisition data values captured on spending documents      |FSIO, SMB-23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(e.g., product and service codes).                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-22            |The system must provide the capability to capture the document line item information on spending documents,    |FSIO, SMB-24                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |including the following:                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Quantity                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Unit of measure                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Unit price                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Extended price                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Description                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Product and service codes                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• FOB shipping points                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Ship to locations (destination codes).                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-23            |The system must validate that the sum of all document lines is equal to the document total.                    |FSIO, SMB-25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-24            |The system must provide the capability to derive the default transaction date from the current system date.    |FSIO, SMB-26                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-25            |The system must provide the capability to derive the accounting period from the transaction date and to prevent|FSIO, SMB-27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |user override.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-26            |The system must capture an agency-specified transaction date (i.e., allow the agency to override the default   |FSIO, SMB-28                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transaction date with a date in any open accounting period).                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-27            |The system must record subsequent activity against a document with the transaction date of that activity, not  |FSIO, SMB-29                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the transaction date of the original document (e.g., a receiving report must capture the transaction date of   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the receipt of goods or services, not the transaction date of the referenced obligation).                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-28            |The system must validate accounting classification elements and prevent the recording of transactions when the |FSIO, SMB-30                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting classification elements or values are missing, invalid, or inactive.                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-29            |The system must validate Treasury trial balance system (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, or GTAS) attributes associated|FSIO, SMB-31                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |with transactions and prevent the recording of transactions when these attributes are missing, invalid, or     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |inactive.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-30            |The system must validate transactions that would post to USSGL accounts (e.g., those used to record borrowing  |FSIO, SMB-32                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authority, contract authority, or investments) to ensure that the associated TAS is designated as having the   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |appropriate RT7 code.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-31            |The system must capture a transaction date and system date on all transactions.                                |FSIO, SMB-33                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-32            |The system must provide the capability to inextricably link financial management transactions to related       |FSIO, SMB-37                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |contracts, while maintaining traceability to the associated source documents, including purchase requisitions, |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |delivery orders, task orders, purchase orders, BPAs, grants, and travel orders.                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-33            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain a reimbursable (interagency) agreement        |FSIO, SMB-38                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |identifier.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-02-34            |The system must record one or more accounting lines for each document line.                                    |FSIO, SMB-39                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03: Document Referencing and Modification                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|SM-03-01            |The system must link documents in the processing chain and must inherit accounting and nonfinancial information|FSIO, SMC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |from one document to another, when the previously recorded document is referenced (e.g., commitment to         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |obligation, receivable to collection). This must include accounting classification, payee, and customer        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |information.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that updates the dollar amount and quantity balances of open   |FSIO, SMC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |documents by accounting line as they are referenced by subsequent documents in the processing chain. For       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |example, it must reduce commitments when referenced by obligations, reduce obligations when referenced by      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |expenditures, reclassify obligations when referenced by advances, and reduce accounts receivable when          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |referenced by collections.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-03            |The system must associate documents with related source documents (e.g., reimbursable agreements, purchase     |FSIO, SMC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |orders, contracts and delivery orders, BPAs, and call numbers, and grants) so that queries show all related    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |activity.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-04            |The system must capture document modifications at the accounting line level that affect the general ledger,    |FSIO, SMC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |including changes to dollar amounts and accounting classifications, and it must validate that funds are        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |available prior to recording the modifications.                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-05            |The system must capture document modifications that do not affect the general ledger or the status of budgetary|FSIO, SMC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |resources (e.g., adding or changing reason codes and descriptions).                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-06            |The system must associate document modifications and cancellations with the original documents so that queries |FSIO, SMC-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |show all related activity.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-07            |The system must provide the capability to reopen a closed document to allow further processing (i.e.,          |FSIO, SMC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |modifications, referencing activity such as collections against receivables) against it, without requiring a   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |new or amended document number.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-08            |The system must provide the capability to reference multiple documents, document lines, and accounting lines in|FSIO, SMC-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |a processing chain. For example, it must provide the capability for an obligating document to reference        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |multiple commitment documents, commitment document lines, and commitment accounting lines.                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-09            |The system must provide the capability to capture the latest system processing status on all documents, for    |FSIO, SMC-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |example, a status of “held” on all documents for which the user has saved (held) the document for later        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |processing. Other system statuses include open, closed, and canceled.                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-10            |The system must provide the capability to reference one document with multiple subsequent documents, document  |FSIO, SMC-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |lines, and accounting lines in the processing chain. For example, the system must allow a commitment to be     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |referenced by multiple obligations and obligation lines.                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-11            |The system must maintain open documents to show the dollar amount and quantity balances of documents by        |FSIO, SMC-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting line. Examples of documents are commitments, obligations, advances, receiving reports, accruals, and|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |receivables.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-12            |The system must associate document references with the original documents so that queries show all related     |FSIO, SMC-18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |activity (a history of the document chain).                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03: System-Generated Transactions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|SM-03-01            |The system must capture start and end dates and posting frequency (monthly, quarterly, or specified number of  |FSIO, SMD-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |days) of recurring entries and reversals such as accruals and obligations.                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
