|SM-03-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates recurring entries and reversals in future       |FSIO, SMD-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting periods (e.g., payroll and travel accruals), when the specified transaction dates are reached. This |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must include entries that cross fiscal years.                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-03            |The system must provide the capability to enter and store future-dated transactions, so that the recording of  |FSIO, SMD-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions and updates to funds availability balances occurs automatically when the specified transaction    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |date is reached and the applicable accounting period is open. The system must validate the future-dated        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transaction upon initial entry and revalidate the transaction at the point it is recorded.                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-04            |The system must provide the capability to be configured to generate batched reversal transactions by any one or|FSIO, SMD-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |a combination of the following parameters:                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting period                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction or document type                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting classification elements                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System date                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction date                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system ID.                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |For example, the system must be able to reverse payroll transactions posted on January 1, 2009.                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that validates that transaction reversals do not violate the   |FSIO, SMD-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |integrity of the document chain. For example, the system should not allow reversal of obligations that have    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |been liquidated by payments.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-03-06            |The system must provide the automated capability to interface financial data and financial transactions to and |FSIO, SMD-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |from systems mandated for governmentwide use (e.g., GTAS, IPAC, TOP, SPS, FedReg, and CCR).                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-04: Audit Trails                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|SM-04-01            |The system must capture and maintain an audit trail from the original postings to the final postings of a      |FSIO, SME-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document. The audit trail must include, at a minimum, the following:                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Document number (or other unique identifier)                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system identifier                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Document line number                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting line number                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• General ledger accounts                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction amounts                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction number                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction date                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System date and time                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• User ID                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Type of activity (addition, modification, liquidation, cancellation).                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-04-02            |The system must capture all document change events (additions, modifications, and cancellations), including the|FSIO, SME-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |date and time of the change and the user ID.                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-04-03            |The system must provide automated functionality to query document change events (additions, modifications, and |FSIO, SME-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |cancellations) using one or a combination of the following query parameters:                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• User ID                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Document number                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Document type                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Change event type (addition, modification, cancellation)                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction date range                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting period.                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Query results must include all parameter values, document numbers, and date and time of the event.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |FSIO, SME-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The system must provide the automated capability to generate an audit trail of all accounting classification   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |structure additions, changes, and deactivations, including the system date and time of the change and the      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|SM-04-04            |effective date of the change.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |                                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|General Ledger                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|GL-01-01            |The system must maintain a chart of accounts consistent with the USSGL chart of accounts, including the        |FSIO, GLA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |proprietary, budgetary, and memorandum accounts; basic numbering structure; and account titles.                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-02            |The system must maintain an association between the chart of accounts and valid USSGL attribute domain values  |FSIO, GLA-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |used in Treasury systems (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, and GTAS).                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-03            |The system must track subsidiary ledger activity attributable to specific general ledger accounts known as     |FSIO, GLA-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |control accounts.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-04            |The system must provide the capability to establish agency-specific USSGL account extensions that summarize to |FSIO, GLA-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |USSGL accounts.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-05            |The system must provide the capability to establish agency-specific memorandum accounts in the chart of        |FSIO, GLA-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounts within the 800000 to 900000 series range.                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-06            |The system must allow a qualified end user to add, change, or deactivate accounts in the chart of accounts     |FSIO, GLA-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |without requiring support from a programmer or application developer.                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-07            |The system must allow a qualified end user to add, change, or deactivate USSGL attribute domain values in order|FSIO, GLA-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |to accommodate changes in Treasury systems (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, and GTAS) without requiring support |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |from a programmer or application developer.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-08            |The system must deliver the core financial system software prepopulated with the current published values for  |FSIO, GLA-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the USSGL chart of accounts.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-09            |The system must deliver the core financial system software prepopulated with the current published USSGL       |FSIO, GLA-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |account attribute values used in Treasury systems (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, and GTAS).                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-01-10            |The system must be automatically updated to be USSGL-compliant as federal requirements are revised over time.  |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02: Transaction Definition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|GL-02-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that records like accounting events consistently using standard|FSIO, GLB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-02            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish the general ledger account postings used in a standard |FSIO, GLB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transaction.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-03            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish standard transactions that include proprietary,        |FSIO, GLB-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |budgetary, and memorandum accounts.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-04            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish standard transactions that reflect the accepted and/or |FSIO, GLB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |approved posting models established by the Treasury USSGL (or other accounting authority, when not addressed by|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Treasury).                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-05            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish business rules or conditions that are used to determine|FSIO, GLB-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the correct general ledger postings. These rules or conditions may include any accounting classification       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |structure data element.                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-06            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish business rules that require, prohibit, or default      |FSIO, GLB-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting classification data elements for a particular general ledger account.                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-07            |The system must provide the capability to establish multiple debit and credit pairs of general ledger accounts |FSIO, GLB-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |within a single standard transaction.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-08            |The system must update document balances and related tables (e.g., available funding) upon recording standard  |FSIO, GLB-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-02-09            |The system must provide the capability to categorize Direct versus Reimbursable line items                     |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03: General Ledger Updating and Editing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|GL-03-01            |The system must update all applicable general ledger account balances (budgetary, proprietary, and memorandum  |FSIO, GLC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounts) simultaneously in a single process as part of a single input transaction event.                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-02            |The system must provide the capability to capture or derive USSGL account attributes used to classify          |FSIO, GLC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting transactions for reporting to Treasury systems (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, or GTAS).            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-03            |The system must validate USSGL account attributes on transactions (whether entered or derived) prior to the    |FSIO, GLC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |posting.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-04            |The system must prevent transactions from posting that would cause a trial balance to become out of balance    |FSIO, GLC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(i.e., debits must equal credits) at the internal fund level and at the accounting classification level of     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |formal funds control.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-05            |The system must prevent transactions from posting that would cause general ledger debits and credits to be out |FSIO, GLC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of balance within the budgetary, proprietary, or memorandum accounts (i.e., budgetary, proprietary, and        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |memorandum accounts must each be self-balancing within a single transaction).                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-06            |The system must prevent transactions from posting that would cause the general ledger control accounts to be   |FSIO, GLC-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |out of balance with the financial transaction activity of any subsidiary ledger.                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-03-07            |The system must prevent transactions from posting to general ledger accounts that have been deactivated.       |FSIO, GLC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04: Upward/Downward Spending Adjustment                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|GL-04-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that derives and records the amount of upward or downward      |FSIO, GLD-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |spending adjustments upon liquidating, canceling, or modifying the dollar amount of prior-year obligations or  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |expenditures, and it must record the spending adjustment at the time of posting the transaction which generated|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |it.                                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-02            |The system must reverse the original spending adjustment entries and generate new spending adjustments for the |FSIO, GLD-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |correct amounts, when correcting documents that previously generated spending adjustment entries.              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines if upward and downward spending adjustments are|FSIO, GLD-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |to expired or to unexpired budget authority and uses that determination to derive and record the               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |USSGL-prescribed spending adjustment entry.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-04            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines if anticipated recoveries have been previously |FSIO, GLD-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |recorded and, when recording a downward spending adjustment, uses that determination to derive the             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |USSGL-prescribed spending adjustment entry.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines if upward and downward adjustments are to paid |FSIO, GLD-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |or to unpaid obligations and/or expenditures and uses that determination to derive and record the              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |USSGL-prescribed spending adjustment entry.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines if upward and downward adjustments are to      |FSIO, GLD-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |delivered or to undelivered orders and uses that determination to derive and record the USSGL-prescribed       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |spending adjustment entry.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-07            |The system must allow a qualified end user to record previously unrecorded obligations to prior-year budget    |FSIO, GLD-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authority or expired budget authority and must generate the related upward spending adjustments in the current |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |year.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-04-08            |The system must identify when posting transactions will invoke upward spending adjustments and apply the       |FSIO, GLD-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-defined funds control edits.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05: Accounting Period Maintenance and Closing Subfunction                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|GL-05-01            |The system must maintain a minimum of 15 accounting periods per fiscal year, with the option to designate the  |FSIO, GLF-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |following:                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• One period for recording opening balances                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Twelve periods for recording monthly activity                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Two additional periods for year-end preclosing and closing entries                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Adds:                                                                                                          |NSF Requirement             |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |1)  The system must maintain a minimum of 16 accounting periods per fiscal year, with the option to designate  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the following:                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• One period for audit adjusments.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-02            |The system must provide the capability to record transactions to any open accounting period and must provide   |FSIO, GLF-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the option to keep multiple accounting periods (minimum of two) open simultaneously.                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-03            |The system must provide the automated capability to close accounting periods and prevent the posting of new    |FSIO, GLF-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions to any closed period.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-04            |The system must provide the automated capability to reopen closed accounting periods and record transactions to|FSIO, GLF-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |them.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-05            |The system must provide automated functionality to execute a year-end closing process that records             |FSIO, GLF-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |USSGL-prescribed preclosing and closing entries in accounting periods separate from other accounting periods.  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-06            |The system must provide the capability to perform multiple simulated closings in a trial/test mode so that     |FSIO, GLF-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |users can review the closing results, clear the closing entries, and rerun the closing process. This           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |functionality must be available for both preclosing entries and closing entries.                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-07            |The system must provide automated capability to generate trial balances that support the review of the closing |FSIO, GLF-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |process run in trial/test mode.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-08            |The system must provide the capability to record transactions to the current and prior fiscal year (i.e., until|FSIO, GLF-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the closing process is complete).                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-09            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines an accounting period’s opening balances based  |FSIO, GLF-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |on the prior accounting period’s closing balances at the USSGL attribute level. The opening general ledger     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |account balances must maintain the USSGL attribute information required to satisfy Treasury system reporting   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |requirements (e.g., FACTS I, FACTS II, GFRS, and GTAS).                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-10            |The system must provide the automated capability to make fiscal year-dependent master data from a prior year   |FSIO, GLF-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |available at the start of a new fiscal year (e.g., rollover, roll forward, or update master data tables).      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-11            |The system must provide the automated capability to make internal fund codes used for a prior funding          |FSIO, GLF-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |origination year, and any attributes related to the internal fund codes, available in the next fiscal year.    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-05-12            |The system must provide automated functionality that groups general ledger account balances by public law      |FSIO, GLF-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |number for the purpose of preparing Treasury adjusted trial balance reports (e.g., FACTS II).                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06: Financial Statement Reporting                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|GL-06-01            |Report end dates—Generate all standard reports as of any accounting period. Amounts reported must reflect the  |FSIO, GLG-01 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |cumulative amount of all transactions posted to the general ledger up through the accounting period specified  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |for running the report. If reporting for the current period, amounts must be cumulative up through the current |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |date.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-02            |Report consistency—Ensure consistency between the data sources used to generate internal and external financial|FSIO, GLG-02 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reports for the same accounting period. The following relationships must be maintained:                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• The beginning and ending balances and total debit and credit activity reported on the Standard Trial Balance |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must equal the beginning and ending balances and total debit and credit activity reported on the FACTS I and   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |FACTS II trial balances.                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• The debit and credit activity reported on the Transaction Register must equal the debit and credit activity  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reported on all of the trial balances.                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• The system-generated FACTS I transfer file must agree with the system-generated Balance Sheet, Statement of  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Net Cost, and Statement of Changes in Net Position                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• The system-generated FACTS II transfer file must agree with the system-generated Statement of Budgetary      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Resources and the SF-133.                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-03            |Transaction register—Generate a transaction register report. Parameters are: accounting period, transaction    |FSIO, GLG-03 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |date range, or system date range. Result is a report displaying the following data elements for each           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transaction posted during the accounting period or date range specified:                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Fiscal year                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• TAS                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal fund code                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Document number                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction number                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction date                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System date                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System time                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Entry user ID                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Debit account number(s)                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Debit amount(s)                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Credit account number(s)                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Credit amount(s)                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Object class                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• U.S. SGL attribute values.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Provide an option to group transactions at the TAS, internal fund, or organization level. Transactions which   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |occur from a single posting event must be grouped together. The report must include headings for each data     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |element displayed. The report must include all transactions in all funds that occurred within the accounting   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |period specified.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-04            |Trial balance—Generate a trial balance report. Parameter is the accounting period. Result is a report providing|FSIO, GLG-04 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the following amounts for each general ledger account:                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Beginning balance for the accounting period                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of debits for the accounting period                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of credits for the accounting period                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cumulative ending balance for the accounting period.                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Provide the option to select whether general ledger account balances are rolled up to the TAS level, internal  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fund level, or organization level, and also whether they are displayed at the GL sub-account level (actual     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounts used for posting transactions) or the U.S. SGL account level. Sub-totals for beginning balance,       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting period activity, and ending balance columns must be provided after each change in organization,     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |internal fund and TAS on the report. The report must include the balances of all funds and all fiscal years    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |maintained by the agency.                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-05            |FACTS I trial balance—Generate a FACTS I trial balance report. Parameter is the accounting period. Result is a |FSIO, GLG-05 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |report displaying the following balances for each U.S. SGL account or U.S. SGL account and attribute           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |combination:                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Beginning balance for the accounting period                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of debits for the accounting period                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of credits for the accounting period                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cumulative ending balance for the accounting period.                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Provide the option to specify whether general ledger account balances are rolled up to the TAS level, internal |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fund level, or organization level. The report must include all general ledger accounts (both FACTS I accounts  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and non-FACTS I accounts). FACTS I accounts must be displayed at the U.S. SGL and attribute level (I.e.        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |separate amounts should be displayed when there is more than one attribute value within an U.S. SGL account).  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Non-FACTS I accounts must be displayed at the U.S. SGL account level. Subtotals for beginning balance,         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting period activity, and ending balance columns must be provided after each change in TAS, internal     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fund, and organization on the report.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-06            |FACTS II trial balance—Generate a FACTS II trial balance report. Parameter is the accounting period. Result is |FSIO, GLG-06 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |a report displaying the following balances for each U.S. SGL account or U.S. SGL account and attribute         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |combination:                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Beginning balance for the accounting period                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of debits for the accounting period                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total amount of credits for the accounting period                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cumulative ending balance for the accounting period.                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Provide the option to specify whether general ledger account balances are rolled up to the TAFS level, internal|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fund level, or organization level. The report must include all general ledger accounts (both FACTS II accounts |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and non-FACTS II accounts). FACTS II accounts must be displayed at the U.S. SGL and attribute level (i.e.,     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |separate amounts should be displayed when there is more than one attribute value within a U.S. SGL account).   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Non-FACTS II accounts must be displayed at the U.S. SGL account level. Subtotals for beginning balance,        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting period activity, and ending balance columns must be provided after each change in TAFS, internal    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fund, and organization on the report.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-07            |FACTS ATB—Export bulk transfer files for FACTS I and FACTS II Adjusted Trial Balances (ATBs) to the Department |FSIO, GLG-07 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of Treasury’s FMS.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-08            |FACTS validation—Validate FACTS I and FACTS II data prior to submission of the FACTS I and FACTS II ATBs and   |FSIO, GLG-08 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the GFRS report to Treasury’s FMS. Provide the option to run validation edits on demand.                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-09            |SF 133—Generate the Report on Budget Execution and Budgetary Resources (SF-133). Parameters include TAFS and   |FSIO, GLG-09 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting period end date. When no TAFS is specified, generate a report for each reportable TAFS. Results are |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reports in accordance with OMB Circular A-11 instructions and the U.S. SGL crosswalk to the SF-133 report.     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|GL-06-10            |Financial statements—Generate the following consolidated agency financial statements:                          |FSIO, GLG-10 (2006)         |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Balance Sheet                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Statement of Net Cost                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |• Statement of Financing                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Statement of Custodial Activity (if applicable).                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Parameter is the accounting period end date. Reports are to be generated from the general ledger account       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |balances and attributes crosswalked in accordance with the U.S. SGL Crosswalks to Standard External Reports.   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Results are reports in accordance with the current OMB Bulletin on Form and Content of Agency Financial        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Statements.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|Receivable Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

|AR-01-01            |The system must maintain non-FedReg customer information to support receivable management processes, including |FSIO, RMA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the following:                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer name                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer identifier                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer type (foreign/sovereign, state/local government, commercial, or consumer)                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS (BPN) number                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Billing method (electronic, hard copy, or other)                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• TIN                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer address                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer contact name                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer contact telephone number                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer contact email address                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Federal vs. non-Federal indicator                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• IRS 1099-C indicator                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Third-party payer name                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Third-party payer address                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Third-party payer contact name                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |• Comment field                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Active/Inactive indicator.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-01-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that immediately identifies an attempt to input a duplicate TIN|FSIO, RMA-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |for a new customer record and provides a warning message to the user about the duplication.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
