|                    |• ID of user who made the change.                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-01-04            |The system must deactivate customers on demand or based on agency-specified length of time with no activity.   |FSIO, RMA-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-01-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that prevents the deactivation of customers that have          |FSIO, RMA-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |unliquidated receivables in the system.                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02: Receivables and Billing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|AR-02-01            |The system must record accounts receivable and corresponding revenues, expense reductions, advance/prepayment  |FSIO, RMB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reclassifications, and other offsets.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-02            |The system must record adjustments to receivables and, on each adjustment, must capture one of the agency’s    |FSIO, RMB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |predefined reason codes and a description.                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-03            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain receivable types that identify the activity   |FSIO, RMB-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |generating the receivable (e.g., sale of goods or services, overpayment, unused advance subject to refund,     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fees, and fines) so that the receivable type can be captured on receivable documents.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-04            |The system must capture the following information on receivable documents:                                     |FSIO, RMB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Baseline receivable date (used to age receivable and determine the delinquency date)                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Description of goods/services or other basis for debt                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Item type to be billed                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Receivable type                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Dates of performance                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer identifier                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer name                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer purchase order number                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reimbursable agreement number                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Billing terms.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines amounts to be billed to customers, when the    |FSIO, RMB-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |amount billed is not based on a reimbursable agreement (such as in most cases when the customer is             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |non-Federal).                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates bills consistent with predefined fee schedules  |FSIO, RMB-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |or payment schedules.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-07            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates bills to third-party payers.                    |FSIO, RMB-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-08            |The system must provide the capability to customize the text and data elements to be displayed on              |FSIO, RMB-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |system-generated bills, by customer type, receivable type, or billing method. For example, a bill for the sale |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of goods and services would need to contain different supporting text than a bill to an employee for an        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |overpayment.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-09            |The system must provide the automated capability to default the bill date based on a system date and to allow  |FSIO, RMB-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |an end user to modify the defaulted bill date.                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-10            |The system must provide automated functionality that consolidates multiple receivables for a customer onto one |FSIO, RMB-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |bill, while retaining identification of each receivable separately within the bill.                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-11            |The system must provide automated functionality that updates receivable status from unbilled to billed when    |FSIO, RMB-18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |bills are generated and associates the receivable with the bill number and bill date.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-12            |The system must capture information from manually prepared bills and must update the receivable document (e.g.,|FSIO, RMB-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |change status of receivable from unbilled to billed) with manual bill information.                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-13            |The system must provide automated functionality that does the following:                                       |FSIO, RMB-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reestablishes a receivable when a check collection is canceled due to insufficient funds or when a chargeback|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |is recorded                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Captures the original baseline receivable date on a reestablished receivable                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Supports the rebilling of a reestablished receivable.                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-14            |The system must provide the automated capability to reschedule existing receivables to be paid under           |FSIO, RMB-21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |installment plans.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-02-15            |The system must provide the capability to reschedule a receivable multiple times.                              |FSIO, RMB-22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |

|AR-03: Debt Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|AR-03-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that calculates and records late payment interest charges on   |FSIO, RMC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |overdue non-Federal receivables based on the Treasury CVFR unless otherwise specified by the agency.           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-02            |The system must provide the automated capability to calculate and record late payment interest charges on      |FSIO, RMC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |overdue non-Federal receivables based on an agency-assigned interest rate that is different from the CVFR, when|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |specified for a particular receivable, customer, or customer type.                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that calculates and records penalties and administrative       |FSIO, RMC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |charges on overdue receivables based on an agency-assigned rate or amount for a particular receivable,         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |receivable type, customer, or customer type.                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-04            |The system must provide the automated capability to record interest, penalties, and administrative costs       |FSIO, RMC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |received to a TAS that is different than that of the principal receivable.                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that ceases or continues accruing interest on delinquent debts |FSIO, RMC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |that have been referred to Treasury or another agency, when specified for a particular referred debt.          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-06            |The system must provide the capability to record the waiver and write-off of receivables, including interest,  |FSIO, RMC-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |penalties, and administrative charges, and to capture an agency-defined reason code.                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-07            |The system must provide the capability to classify receivables written off as currently not collectible or as  |FSIO, RMC-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |closed out.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-08            |The system must maintain data on receivables that have been waived or written off.                             |FSIO, RMC-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-09            |The system must associate receivables with dunning notice dates, referral dates, and comments to support debt  |FSIO, RMC-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |collection activities.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-10            |The system must calculate and record the allowance for loss on uncollectible accounts receivable based on      |FSIO, RMC-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-defined criteria, including percentage of gross book value of receivables within an age category,       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |customer type, and receivable type.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-11            |The system must group delinquent debt into user-defined categories based on stored or derivable system values, |FSIO, RMC-18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |including the following categories needed for the TROR:                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• In bankruptcy                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• In forbearance or formal appeals process                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• In foreclosure                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• At private collection agencies                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• At DOJ                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Eligible for internal offset                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• In wage garnishment                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• At Treasury for cross-servicing                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• At Treasury for offset                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• At agency                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Other.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-12            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain agency-specific reason codes and related      |FSIO, RMC-22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |descriptions for write-offs of receivables.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-13            |The system must provide the automated capability to suppress the generation of dunning notices and cease       |FSIO, RMC-23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |collection efforts for the following:                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Individual receivables selected by a qualified end user                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Categories of receivables as defined using parameters such as the delinquent debt category (e.g., in         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |bankruptcy, at private collection agency)                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Receivables for which the agency has issued a 1099-C.                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-03-14            |The system must be able to create a batch data file in FedDebt-compliant format                                |NSF Requirement             |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04: Collections and Off-Sets                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|AR-04-01            |The system must provide the capability to capture information on collections, including the following:         |FSIO, RMD-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer identifier and name (or vendor/payee identifier and name, if collection is due to a previous        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |overpayment)                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Deposit number                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Deposit date                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Deposit confirmation date                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Obligation reference number                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reimbursable agreement reference number                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Advance reference number                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment reference number                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Bill number                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source (cash, EFT, check, money order, credit card, IPAC, SF 1081, electronic file from bank, or TOP)        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Transaction authorization number (relevant to credit card collection)                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Credit card account number                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Comments.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-02            |The system must do the following:                                                                              |FSIO, RMD-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Record collections against receivables                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reference the receivable document                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Update customer records and related billing information.                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-03            |The system must record collections with corresponding revenues, expenditure reductions, advance/prepayment     |FSIO, RMD-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reclassifications, or other offsets, when receivables were not previously established.                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-04            |The system must provide automated functionality that applies collections against receivables first to penalty  |FSIO, RMD-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and administrative costs, second to interest receivable, and third to outstanding debt principal, in accordance|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |with the DCIA, unless otherwise stated in program statute.                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-05            |The system must record collections received against receivables that were waived or written off.               |FSIO, RMD-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-06            |The system must provide the capability to do the following:                                                    |FSIO, RMD-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Record receipt of refunds of previous overpayments, for which a receivable was not established               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reference the obligating document associated with the overpayment                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reduce the cumulative amount expended on the obligating document by the amount refunded.                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-07            |The system must provide the capability to do the following:                                                    |FSIO, RMD-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Record receipt of refunds of unused advances or prepayments, for which a receivable was not established      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reference the obligating document associated with the advance                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reduce the cumulative amount advanced on the obligating document by the amount refunded.                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-08            |The system must provide automated functionality that records a refund payable when collections for a particular|FSIO, RMD-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |receivable exceed the outstanding balance of the receivable.                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-09            |The system must provide automated functionality that records and classifies cash and check collections as      |FSIO, RMD-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |deposited or undeposited.                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-10            |The system must provide the capability to generate a deposit ticket (SF 215) from the cash and check           |FSIO, RMD-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |collections recorded in the system.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-11            |The system must provide automated functionality that updates the status of a collection from undeposited to    |FSIO, RMD-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |deposited upon receipt of confirmation of the deposit from Treasury.                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-12            |The system must allow the accounts receivable module to check the accounts payable module for outstanding      |NSF Requirement             |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payments to customers.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AR-04-13            |The system must provide the capability to automatically deduct the customer's payment amount by the amount of  |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the receivable (i.e. - AR/AP netting capability).                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|Fund Balance with Treasury                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|FB-01-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that maintains multiple ALCs.                                  |FSIO, FBA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |reporter.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-03            |The system must maintain an ALC’s business activity in accordance with Treasury Partial FMS 224 guidance.      |FSIO, FBA-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-04            |The system must maintain the GWA reporter category for GWA reporter ALCs in accordance with Treasury Partial   |FSIO, FBA-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |FMS 224 guidance.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that captures the ALC on transactions that affect the FBWT and |FSIO, FBA-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |are reported to Treasury on FMS 224 or Partial FMS 224, or through the GWA system.                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that imports and maintains valid TAS/BETC combinations provided|FSIO, FBA-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |by a Treasury source system (e.g., SAM) for classification of the agency’s FBWT transactions in the GWA system.|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-07            |The system must provide automated functionality that captures the TAS/BETC on transactions that affect the FBWT|FSIO, FBA-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and are reported through the GWA system.                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-08            |The system must provide automated functionality that classifies transactions that affect the FBWT, and are     |FSIO, FBA-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reported on FMS 224 or Partial 224, or through the GWA system, according to the Treasury system of origin      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(e.g., IPAC, CA$HLINK II, TDO Payment, or Reclassification).                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-01-09            |The system must provide the capability to capture the unique Treasury document reference number on all         |FSIO, FBA-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions that affect the FBWT.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02: Payment Information                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|FB-02-01            |The system must provide the automated capability to import payment confirmation data from a Treasury           |FSIO, FBB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |governmentwide system (e.g., SPS, PAM, or GOALS II/IAS RFC Agency Link).                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that liquidates individual disbursement-in-transit transactions|FSIO, FBB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and records confirmed disbursements upon receipt of payment confirmation from a Treasury governmentwide system |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(e.g., SPS, PAM, GOALS II/IAS RFC Agency Link, or IPAC).                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that updates payments with the paid schedule number, payment   |FSIO, FBB-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |confirmation date, and check number or trace number upon receipt of confirmation data from a Treasury          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |governmentwide system (e.g., SPS, PAM, GOALS II/IAS RFC Agency Link, or IPAC).                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-04            |The system must provide automated functionality that assigns check numbers to individual payments, based on the|FSIO, FBB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedule’s check range received from a Treasury governmentwide system (e.g., SPS, PAM, GOALS II/IAS RFC|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Agency Link, or IPAC).                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-05            |The system must provide the capability to correct system-assigned check numbers on payment records that do not |FSIO, FBB-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |match the actual check number assigned by Treasury.                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that assigns check numbers to individual payment records when a|FSIO, FBB-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedule has multiple check ranges or a break in check numbers.                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-02-07            |The system must record disbursement cancellations for individual payments that have not been negotiated.       |FSIO, FBB-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03: FBwT Reconciliation and Reporting                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|FB-03-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that imports a disbursement support listing (e.g., ACR support |FSIO, FBC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |listing) from a Treasury governmentwide system (e.g., GOALS II/IAS RFC Agency Link) to facilitate              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reconciliation with Treasury of agency-recorded disbursements and cancellations.                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-02            |The system must provide the automated capability to compare individual amounts from a Treasury disbursement    |FSIO, FBC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |support listing (e.g., ACR support listing) with amounts recorded in the agency’s general ledger by payment    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |schedule number and accounting period.                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates a discrepancy report showing the differences    |FSIO, FBC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |between disbursements recorded in the agency’s general ledger and disbursements listed on a Treasury           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |disbursement support listing (e.g., ACR support listing) by accounting period. The report must display the     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedule number, dollar amount, Treasury confirmation date, agency document number, and agency         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transaction date, as appropriate, of the following items:                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the Treasury disbursement support listing and not in the agency’s general ledger                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the Treasury disbursement support listing for a different amount than in the agency’s general ledger|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items in the agency’s general ledger and not on the Treasury disbursement support listing.                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-04            |The system must provide the automated capability to import an intragovernmental transaction support listing    |FSIO, FBC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(e.g., IPAC support listing) from a Treasury system (e.g., IPAC) to facilitate reconciliation of               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-recorded intragovernmental transactions processed through a Treasury intragovernmental processing       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |system.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-05            |The system must provide the capability to compare individual amounts from an intragovernmental transaction     |FSIO, FBC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |support listing (e.g., IPAC support listing) with amounts recorded in the agency’s general ledger.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates a discrepancy report showing the differences    |FSIO, FBC-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |between intragovernmental payment and collection transactions recorded in the agency’s general ledger and items|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |on a Treasury intragovernmental transaction support listing (e.g., IPAC support listing) by accounting period. |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The report must display the Treasury document reference number, the Treasury confirmation date, dollar amount, |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency document number, and agency transaction date, as appropriate, of the following items:                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the intragovernmental transaction support listing and not in the agency’s general ledger            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the intragovernmental transaction support listing for a different amount than in the agency’s       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |general ledger                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items in the agency’s general ledger and not on the intragovernmental supporting listing.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-07            |The system must provide automated functionality that imports a detailed list of deposit and debit voucher      |FSIO, FBC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |activity (e.g., DT/DV support listing) from a Treasury collection system to facilitate reconciliation of       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-recorded deposits and debit vouchers with Treasury.                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-08            |The system must provide the capability to compare individual amounts from a detailed list of deposit and debit |FSIO, FBC-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |voucher activity (e.g., DT/DV support listing) obtained from a Treasury collection system with the amounts     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |recorded in the agency’s general ledger by document number and accounting period.                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-09            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates a discrepancy report showing the differences    |FSIO, FBC-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |between deposit and debit voucher transactions recorded in the agency’s general ledger and items on a Treasury |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |listing of deposit and debit voucher activity (e.g., DT/DV support listing) by accounting period. The report   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must include the Treasury document reference number, Treasury confirmation date, dollar amount, agency document|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |number, and agency transaction date, as appropriate, of the following items:                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the Treasury listing of deposit and debit voucher activity and not in the agency’s general ledger   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items on the Treasury listing of deposit and debit voucher activity for a different amount than in the       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency’s general ledger                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Items in the agency’s general ledger and not on the Treasury listing of deposit and debit voucher activity.  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FB-03-10            |The system must provide the capability to generate a report of cash transactions based on user-defined         |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |parameters (e.g., date range).                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|Funds Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

|                    |and year.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |formats. Access to database schema and data should be made available.                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |available.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |operating plan.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|FM-02: Budget Authority                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|FM-02-01            |The system must record funding based on related budget execution documents (e.g., appropriation warrants and   |FSIO, FMC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |apportionments).                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-02            |The system must record budget authority (defined in OMB Circular No. A-11), including direct appropriations,   |FSIO, FMC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |borrowing authority, contract authority, and spending authority from offsetting collections.                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-03            |The system must record changes to budget authority, including reductions, rescissions, amounts withheld or made|FSIO, FMC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |unavailable, supplemental appropriations, transfers, reprogramming, and legal limitations.                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-04            |The system must record budget authority from continuing resolutions.                                           |FSIO, FMC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-05            |The system must capture the start and end dates, amount, and public law number of a continuing resolution.     |FSIO, FMC-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-06            |The system must provide the capability to amend continuing resolutions, or to record new follow-on continuing  |FSIO, FMC-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |resolutions that supersede an existing continuing resolution, and must capture the new values of the continuing|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |resolution, including start and end dates and public law number.                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-07            |The system must record the realization of previously anticipated reimbursable authority upon recognition of an |FSIO, FMC-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |unfilled customer order, when an advance is not required. In these cases, the amount of funds made available   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must equal the amount of the unfilled customer order.                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-08            |The system must record the realization of actual reimbursable authority only upon receipt of an advance from a |FSIO, FMC-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |non-Federal source unless a law specifically allows realization of reimbursable authority without an advance.  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |When an advance is required, the amount of funds made available must equal the amount of the advance received. |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-09            |The system must record apportioned funds in accordance with the latest OMB-approved SF 132 Apportionment and   |FSIO, FMC-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Reapportionment Schedule.                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-10            |The system must record anticipated budget authority, including anticipated reimbursements, collections, and    |FSIO, FMC-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |recoveries.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-11            |The system must provide the capability to prevent reductions in budget authority (e.g., reversals, rescissions,|FSIO, FMC-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |withdrawals, and transfers) from exceeding the dollar amount of budget authority distributed and unobligated at|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |any level of the accounting classification.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-12            |The system must provide the capability to decommit and deobligate balances of budget authority so that         |FSIO, FMC-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reductions in budget authority can occur up to the unexpended balance (such as in the case of rescissions).    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-13            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines the status (unexpired, expired, or canceled) of|FSIO, FMC-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |each internal fund from the start and end dates of the associated TAS at the time of posting a transaction,    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |viewing information about a fund (e.g., master data), or running a report.                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-14            |The system must prevent use of anticipated budgetary resources (e.g., prior-year recoveries, offsetting        |FSIO, FMC-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |collections) until they are realized, apportioned, and available for use. The amount of funds made available   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |must equal the amount realized.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-15            |The system must provide the capability to establish validity periods for apportionments and reapportionments   |FSIO, FMC-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |for all apportionment categories to determine whether funds are available for allotment and consumption.       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-16            |The system must have the capability to record fund availability details such as no year, one year, multi-year, |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |etc.                                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-02-17            |The system must have the capability to automatically cover upward adjustments with expired funds.              |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03: Funds Distribution                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|FM-03-01            |The system must provide the capability to capture legal (statutory) and administrative (agency-imposed)        |FSIO, FMD-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |limitations on the use of funds.                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-02            |The system must record allotments and suballotments (i.e., distribute funds) to any level in the accounting    |FSIO, FMD-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |classification structure.                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-03            |The system must record up to eight levels of funds distribution, including levels used for appropriation and   |FSIO, FMD-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |apportionment of budget authority.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-04            |The system must prevent distributions of budget authority, including apportionments, allotments, suballotments,|FSIO, FMD-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and lower level distributions, from exceeding the amount of funds available at the next highest level of       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |budgetary resources.                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-05            |The system must allow modifications to both formal and informal funding distributions at any level in the      |FSIO, FMD-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting classification.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-06            |The system must record the withdrawal (or cancellation) of unobligated allotments, suballotments (both expired |FSIO, FMD-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and unexpired), and lower level distributions by one or more accounting classification elements (parameters) at|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the end of a fiscal period or on demand as in rescissions.                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-07            |The system must provide automated functionality that extracts and loads budget planning and formulation data to|FSIO, FMD-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and from the core financial system.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-08            |The system must provide the capability to distribute funds below the level at which they are controlled.       |FSIO, FMD-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-03-09            |The system must provide the capability to establish validity periods for allotments and suballotments to       |FSIO, FMD-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |determine whether funds are available for further distribution and consumption.                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04: Funds Control                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|FM-04-01            |The system must monitor the availability of funds at each level of the accounting classification structure for |FSIO, FME-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |which budget authority is distributed and controlled and, when attempting to process a spending document that  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |exceeds the budget authority available, must issue a rejection or warning, by accounting line, to the user.    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-02            |The system must allow spending documents to exceed budget authority limits based on pre-defined thresholds.    |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
