|FM-04-03            |The system must provide workflow capability to obtain approvals on spending documents that exceed pre-defined  |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |thresholds.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-04            |The system must process spending documents that affect the availability and/or status of funds, including      |FSIO, FME-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |commitments, obligations, and expenditures.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-05            |The system must provide the capability to record spending transactions, including commitments, obligations,    |FSIO, FME-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |advances, and expenditures, at or below the level of funds distribution.                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-06            |The system must provide the capability to record transactions against prior-year funds, both expired and       |FSIO, FME-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |unexpired, in the current year.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-07            |The system must monitor amounts paid out of current-year funds to cover obligations made against a canceled    |FSIO, FME-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |account; and it must prevent payments that cumulatively exceed 1 percent of the current-year appropriation or  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the total amount available prior to close of the original appropriation.                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-08            |The system must determine whether funds are available (i.e., unexpired, expired, or canceled) based on the     |FSIO, FME-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |budget fiscal year on a spending document.                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-09            |The system must prevent the allotment and reuse of prior-year deobligated balances in expired funds from being |FSIO, FME-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |obligated in the current year.                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-10            |The system must update balances used for funds control to reflect changes in the status and amounts of         |FSIO, FME-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |commitments, obligations, expenditures, and available balances.                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-11            |The system must provide the automated capability to monitor the use of funds against financial, operating, and |FSIO, FME-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |spending plans.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-12            |The system must provide the automated capability to monitor the use of funds against legal (statutory) and     |FSIO, FME-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |administrative (agency-imposed) limitations (e.g., use of funds against a specific object class limitation).   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-13            |The system must provide the automated capability to monitor spending against the amount of reimbursable        |FSIO, FME-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authority available in a given reimbursable agreement.                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-14            |The system must reduce the amount of reimbursable authority available as customer orders are filled.           |FSIO, FME-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-15            |The system must prevent the use of funds in excess of the authorized amount available for reimbursable         |FSIO, FME-18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agreements, BPAs, contracts, work orders, task orders, and grants.                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-16            |The system must provide the capability to capture a suggested vendor identifier on commitment documents.       |FSIO, FME-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-17            |The system must provide automated functionality that closes commitment documents and document lines under the  |FSIO, FME-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |following circumstances:                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• By the system upon final obligation                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• By an authorized user                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• As part of the year-end preclosing process.                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-18            |The system must provide the capability to capture, on obligating documents, any data elements that support or  |FSIO, FME-21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |facilitate subsequent spending chain activity, including the following data elements:                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment terms (e.g., accelerated payment terms, discount terms)                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Matching terms (two-way, three-way, four-way)                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor identifier                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor name (legal, DBA, or division)                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor DUNS (BPN) number                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system document number                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Approval date                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Third-party payee identifier                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Award date                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-19            |The system must provide the capability to allow a qualified end user to establish and maintain agency-specific |FSIO, FME-22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |obligation types to identify the activity that initiated the obligation such as a travel order, purchase order,|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |grant award, task order, work order, BPA call, or credit card.                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-20            |The system must ensure that the CCR vendor information stored on the obligating document matches the updated   |FSIO, FME-23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |CCR vendor information stored on the vendor file (i.e., recently refreshed with data from CCR) when an         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |obligation is submitted for final approval.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-21            |The system must provide the capability to record obligations when there is no related commitment.              |FSIO, FME-24                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-22            |The system must provide the capability to allow a change to the vendor name on an obligating document, even    |FSIO, FME-25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |after the vendor name was directly inherited from the commitment document.                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-23            |The system must provide automated functionality that closes obligation documents and document lines when an    |FSIO, FME-26                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authorized user indicates that a payment is final.                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-24            |The system must process, track, and control records of calls against BPAs.                                     |FISO, FME-27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-25            |The system must process, track, and control delivery orders against contract limitations.                      |FSIO, FME-28                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-26            |The system must record advance payments, such as travel advances, contract prepayments, and grant advances.    |FSIO, FME-29                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |When recording an advance payment, the system must reference an obligating document and inherit all accounting |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |classification structure information from the obligation to the advance.                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-27            |The system must record expenditures incurred against advance payments, reducing the advance balance and        |FSIO, FME-31                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |liquidating the referenced obligation.                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-28            |The system must provide the capability to capture, on obligating documents, any data elements that support or  |FSIO, FME-32                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |facilitate funds control, invoicing, or receipt of goods or services, including the following data elements:   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Requester’s name                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Telephone number of requester                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Deliver-to location (e.g., room number, division)                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Contact name                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• COTR name                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• COTR telephone number                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Comments.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-29            |The system must provide the capability to prevent advance payments under contracts from exceeding a specific   |FSIO, FME-35                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |percentage of the total obligation (e.g., 15%) prior to any performance under the contract.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-30            |The system must provide the capability to capture payment terms on obligations that are different than those   |FSIO, FME-36                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |specified on the associated vendor record.                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-31            |The system must provide control features that ensure consistency between the amounts reflected in the funds    |FSIO, FME-39                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |control structure and the related general ledger account balances at the end of each update cycle. The update  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |cycle must be no greater than 24 hours.                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|FM-04-32            |The system must track the balance advanced against an obligation.                                              |FSIO, FME-40                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|Payment Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|AP-01-01            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain information about non-Federal vendors         |FSIO , PMA-01               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(payees), which, at a minimum, must include the following:• Vendor identifier/code (agency assigned)• Vendor   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |type (Institution, Employee, Vendor, etc.)• Vendor name (legal)• Vendor name (DBA)• Vendor name (division)•    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Vendor physical address (street address 1 and 2, city, state, zip+4, country)• Business type (as defined in CCR|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |rules for business types: small business, woman-owned business, etc.)• Organization type (as defined in CCR    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |rules for organization types: non-Federal government organization, corporate entity, sole proprietorship,      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |partnership, etc.)• TIN (IRS assigned)• DUNS (BPN) number (D&B-assigned)• DUNS+4 number (for each instance of  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |banking information at same physical location)• Commercial And Government Entity Code (CAGE Code) - a unique   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |identifier assigned to suppliers to various government or defense agencies, as well as to government agencies  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |themselves and also various organizations. CAGE codes provide a standardized method of identifying a given     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |facility at a specific location. (agency assigned)• CCR registration indicator (required or exempt)• CCR       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |registration status (active or expired)                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Product Service Codes (PSCs) - numerical codes designed by the government to create descriptions for products|                            |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and services                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• North American Industrial Classification System (NAICS Codes) are numerical codes designed by the U.S.       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Government in order to create uniform descriptions of small business types and size standards                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Prompt Pay indicator and type, or payment terms                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Credit card vendor indicator                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Default payment method (EFT, check)                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Alternate payment methods (EFT, check)                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Four remittance addresses, for check payments (street address 1 and 2, city, state, zip+4, and country)      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• POC information (name, telephone number, fax number, and email address) for each remittance address          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Four instances of EFT banking information (ABA routing number, account number; and account type, i.e.,       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |checking or savings)                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Four instances of EFT bank name                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• POC information (name, telephone number, fax number, and email address) for each instance of EFT banking     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |information, accommodating contact types defined as mandatory in CCR business rules                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• IRS Form 1099 indicator                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• IRS Form W-2 indicator                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Comment field                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Active/Inactive indicator                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Debarment indicator                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Debarment start and end dates.                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Type of Payment (i.e., Grant, Non-Grant, Payroll)                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• TIPRA Identifier                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Backup Withholding Identifier                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-02            |The system must maintain information for multiple third-party payees associated with a primary vendor, which,  |FSIO , PMA-02               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |at a minimum must include the following:                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee name                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee POC                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee telephone number                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee email address                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Remittance address or banking information (account number, account type, RTN).                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that links payee and customer records that represent the same  |FSIO , PMA-03               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |entity.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-04            |The system must interface vendor data from CCR no less frequently than daily.                                  |FSIO , PMA-04               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-05            |The system must prevent unauthorized users from manually updating CCR-originated data in the payee information |FSIO , PMA-06               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |file.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-06            |The system must provide the capability to allow a user to establish multiple DUNS numbers for the same legal   |FSIO , PMA-07               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |entity, even if two or more DUNS numbers reference the same TIN.                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-07            |The system must provide the automated capability to link multiple DUNS+4 numbers to a single DUNS number.      |FSIO , PMA-08               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-08            |The system must provide the automated capability to associate each combination of the DUNS and DUNS+4 numbers  |FSIO , PMA-09               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |with one and only one bank account for each CCR vendor.                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-09            |The system must identify an attempt to input a duplicate TIN for a new vendor record and must provide an       |FSIO , PMA-10               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |immediate error message to the user when the duplication is identified, forcing the user to contact authorized |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |personnel prior to prceeding.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-10            |The system must maintain a history of changes made to payee information, which, at a minimum, must include the |FSIO , PMA-12               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |following:                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Name of data item changed                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Before and after values                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Entry date and time                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• ID of user who made the change                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System source of change (e.g., FASTLANE, CCR)                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-11            |The system must provide the capability to deactivate payees on demand or based on agency-specified length of   |FSIO , PMA-14               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |time with no activity.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-12            |The system must provide the capability to prevent the deactivation of payees that have unliquidated obligations|FSIO , PMA-15               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |or unpaid payment requests in the system.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-13            |The system must provide the capability to prevent new obligations that reference inactive or debarred payees.  |FSIO , PMA-16               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-14            |The system must provide the capability to prevent new obligations and payments to vendors with expired CCR     |FSIO , PMA-17               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |registrations.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-15            |The system must provide the capability to allow a user to define payment methods as EFT, check, IPAC, or       |FSIO , PMA-19               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |interfund transfer.                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-16            |The system must provide the automated capability to default payments to a third-party payee specified on the   |FSIO , PMA-20               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payee information maintenance table and/or to automatically override the default value with the third-party    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payee designated on the obligation. This capability should be at the obligation, not payee, level.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-17            |The system must provide automated functionality that redirects payments from the payee to a legally mandated   |FSIO , PMA-21               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |third-party payee until redirection is no longer required. This capability should be at the obligation, not    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payee, level.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-18            |The system must maintain vendor data from CCR, which requires fully supporting all CCR data formats. For       |FSIO , PMA-23               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |example, system data types must be consistent with CCR data types, and system field lengths must be equal to or|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |greater than CCR field lengths.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-01-19            |The system must provide the automated capability to generate a report identifying payee records that may be    |FSIO , PMA-25               |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |eligible for deactivation, based on the payee record satisfying one of the following criteria:• Expiration of  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-specified period of time with no activity• No outstanding balance in the agency’s ledger for            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |commitments, obligations, disbursements in transit, accounts payable, accounts receivable, or advances.The     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |report must include, at a minimum, the payee identifier, legal name, and period of time with no activity.      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02: Accounts Payable                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|AP-02-01            |The system must record full or partial receipt and/or acceptance of goods and services by document line. This  |FSIO, PMB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |capability must include the receipt and/or acceptance of partial quantities of goods and services on each      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document line.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that records an accrued liability or liquidates an advance     |FSIO, PMB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(when applicable) and reclassifies the order from undelivered to delivered, at the accounting line level, upon |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |receipt of goods or services.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-03            |The system must capture information related to the receipt of goods and services, including the following:     |FSIO, PMB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Receiving official                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Dates goods were delivered or services were performed                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Quantity/dollar amount received                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee identifier and name                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Ship-to locations.                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-04            |The system must provide the capability to allow a user to update information related to the receipt of goods   |FSIO, PMB-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and services, to specify, upon acceptance, the following:                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Acceptance official                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date goods or services were accepted                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Quantity/dollar amount accepted                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date goods or services were rejected                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Quantity/dollar amount rejected.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-05            |The system must capture data related to the actual amount of goods received (even if in excess of the amount   |FSIO, PMB-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |ordered) and the amount returned, without generating an accounting entry, and must make the data available for |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |further processing on a receiving report.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-06            |The system must capture the following information related to goods received, in excess of the amount ordered,  |FSIO, PMB-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and returned:                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Rejecting Official                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Obligating document number                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Actual quantity ordered                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Actual quantity received                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Deliver-to location                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Actual quantity returned                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date goods were returned.                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-07            |The system must provide the capability to allow a user to establish and maintain reason codes and related      |FSIO, PMB-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |descriptions to identify discrepancies related to the receipt and acceptance of goods and/or services.         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-08            |The system must reverse accrued liabilities and update related receiving reports when goods previously recorded|FSIO, PMB-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |as received are subsequently rejected during the acceptance process.                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-09            |The system must prevent an accrual for goods and/or services received from exceeding the total of the amount   |FSIO, PMB-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |ordered plus an allowable tolerance, as specified by NSF.                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-02-10            |The system must provide the capability to identify a referenced obligation document line as closed after the   |FSIO, PMB-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |last expected receipt, whether partial or final, has been received and accepted.                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03: Payment Request                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|AP-03-01            |The system must provide the capability to capture the following information on payment request documents:      |FSIO, PMC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request number or account number                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request date                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request receipt date                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee identifier and name                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS (BPN) number                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number for CCR and FedReg vendors                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source system document number                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Contract line/subline number                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Name and address of contractor official to whom payment is to be sent                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment terms (including discount for prompt payment)                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Shipping terms (e.g., shipment number and shipment date)                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee contact name and telephone number                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Dates goods were delivered or services were provided                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• User comments                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date payment request was returned to payee, when improper                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date payment request was resubmitted by payee as proper, when previously improper.                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-02            |The system must capture a payment request number of up to 30 characters or the current requirement of I        |FSIO, PMC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |TFM-6-5000 and include the complete number on all payment files, reports and query results.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-03            |The system must provide the capability to capture at least 9,999 payment request line items per payment request|FSIO, PMC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |document.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-04            |The system must provide the capability to establish criteria to be used to identify duplicate payment requests.|FSIO, PMC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-05            |The system must provide the automated capability to identify duplicate payment requests based on agency        |FSIO, PMC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |predefined criteria (business rules).                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-06            |The system must provide the capability to validate, prior to recording, a payment request from a registered CCR|FSIO, PMC-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |vendor for the following CCR vendor information:                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor status is active.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor name on payment request or referenced obligation is the same as CCR company name (legal, DBA, or      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |division).                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number on referenced obligation is the same as DUNS+4 number on vendor file.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-07            |The system must provide the capability to validate, at the time of preliminary payment scheduling, payments to |FSIO, PMC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |registered CCR vendors for the following CCR vendor information:                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor status is active.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor name on payment is the same as CCR company name (legal, DBA, or division) on vendor file.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number on referenced obligation is the same as DUNS+4 number on vendor file.                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-08            |The system must provide the automated capability to match payment requests to obligations, receiving reports,  |FSIO, PMC-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and acceptance information by document line item and quantity. The system must be able to perform two-way,     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |three-way, and four-way matching, while preventing the payment of payment requests until the matching process  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |is complete.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-09            |The system must process payment requests for payment of partial quantities received and accepted or for partial|FSIO, PMC-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |periods of performance.                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-10            |The system must provide the automated capability to validate that the period of performance dates on receipt,  |FSIO, PMC-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |acceptance, and payment request documents are within the period of performance dates on prior, referenced      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |spending chain document lines.                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-11            |The system must allow an authorized end user to record a payment request as a partial or final payment of the  |FSIO, PMC-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |referenced obligation and, if the payment is final, must deobligate any unliquidated balance and close the     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |obligation and receipt. B499                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-12            |The system must also allow an authorized end user to reopen the obligation for editing after it has been       |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |closed.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-13            |The system must allow an authorized end user to record additional shipping and other charges, if authorized and|FSIO, PMC-13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |within variance tolerances, to adjust the payment amount.                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-14            |The system must provide the capability to do the following:                                                    |FSIO, PMC-14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Establish recurring payments                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Schedule items (e.g., contracts and leases) for payment on an interval determined by the agency (e.g.,       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |weekly, biweekly, monthly, quarterly, or other specified number of days)                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Automatically trigger payments based on the scheduled frequency.                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-15            |The system must allow an authorized end user to maintain recurring payment information, including changes in   |FSIO, PMC-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agreement terms, amounts, and frequency.                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-16            |The system must warehouse approved payment requests for future payment scheduling.                             |FSIO, PMC-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-17            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish and maintain reason codes and related descriptions for |FSIO, PMC-17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment request processing irregularities in the following categories:                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Advantageous discount lost                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Interest paid                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Improper payment made                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request adjusted                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request held from payment schedule                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request canceled.                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |For example, the code “DL01” could denote “Advantageous discount lost because payment request was misplaced.”  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-18            |The system must allow a qualified end user to establish and maintain reason codes and related descriptions for |FSIO, PMC-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |improper payment requests received.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-19            |The system must capture reason codes and related descriptions on payment request documents when any of the     |FSIO, PMC-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |following types of payment request processing irregularities occur:                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Advantageous discount lost                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Interest paid                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Improper payment made                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request adjusted                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request held from payment schedule                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment request canceled.                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-20            |The system must capture reasons and related descriptions on improper payment requests that have been received  |FSIO, PMC-21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and held in the system due to failed validations.                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-21            |The system must provide the capability to release, for further processing, previously held payment requests and|FSIO, PMC-23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
