|                    |scheduled payments upon a vendor record update for the following:                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor status change from expired to active                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Vendor name on document or referenced obligation now the same as CCR company name (legal, DBA, or division)  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number on document or referenced obligation now the same as DUNS+4 number on vendor file.             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The system must calculate payment due dates for released payment requests and must recalculate payment due     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |dates for those that were previously scheduled and held.                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-22            |The system must provide automated functionality that collects payment request data from payees.                |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-23            |The system must provide automated functionality that imports payment request data from payees based on the     |FSIO, PMC-24                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |standard Federal schema.                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-24            |The system must provide the automated capability to validate payment requests for the minimum data required    |FSIO, PMC-25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |under the Prompt Payment Act (e.g., payment request number and payment request date).                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-03-25            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain matching rules that use matching terms defined|FSIO, PMC-27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |as follows:                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Two-way—either obligation and payment request, or obligation and receipt without payment request (e.g., for  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |some recurring payments)                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Three-way—obligation, simultaneous receipt/acceptance, and payment request                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Four-way—obligation, receipt, acceptance, and payment request.                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04: Disbursing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|AP-04-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that calculates the due date of vendor payments in accordance  |FSIO, PMD-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |with 5 CFR 1315.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that calculates multiple due dates when lines on a payment     |FSIO, PMD-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |request have different payment terms.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that validates payment terms on payment requests against the   |FSIO, PMD-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment terms on the related obligating documents. The system must calculate the most advantageous terms, store|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |them on the payment request documents, and use them to calculate the payment due dates and amounts.            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-04            |The system must provide the capability to schedule a payment request for payment on a date other than the      |FSIO, PMD-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |system-calculated due date, as specified by the user, and it must capture a reason code for the user change in |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment date.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-05            |The system must provide the automated capability to establish payment dates using calendars that guide the     |FSIO, PMD-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |determination of the projected payment date.                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-06            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain business rules needed to determine whether    |FSIO, PMD-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |taking a discount is economically justified as defined in I TFM 6-8040, and it must calculate a discount in    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accordance with these established rules.                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-07            |The system must calculate amounts to be disbursed, including discounts, interest, and penalties, in accordance |FSIO, PMD-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |with 5 CFR 1315, and it must record the applicable amounts on separate lines of the payment request documents. |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-08            |The system must calculate payment amounts and due dates using Treasury rate tables, i.e., Prompt Pay Act       |FSIO, PMD-09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Interest rate and Current Value of Funds rate.                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-09            |The system must provide the capability to calculate and apply interest and discount amounts across multiple    |FSIO, PMD-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accounting lines on a payment request.                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-10            |The system must provide the capability to validate that prompt payment interest is paid from the funds         |FSIO, PMD-11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |available for the administration of the program for which the penalty was incurred, as specified  by an        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authorized user, and it must capture a reason code for the user change.                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-11            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain a coding scheme for assigning identifiers to  |FSIO, PMD-12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedules.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-12            |The system must provide automated functionality that records disbursements-in-transit entries immediately after|FSIO, PMD-15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the payments are certified.                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-13            |The system must provide automated functionality that notifies the user that the payment requests selected for  |FSIO, PMD-16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment, if disbursed, would cause the fund to enter into a negative fund balance position.                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-15            |The system must provide automated functionality that relates a single payment request to a payment split among |FSIO, PMD-19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |multiple bank accounts. B516                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-16            |The system must provide automated functionality that relates a single payment request to a payment split among |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |multiple payees.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-17            |The system must have the automated capability to generate check and EFT payment files in the current Treasury  |FSIO, PMD-20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |FMS-defined formats for both Treasury and non-Treasury disbursing offices.                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-18            |The system must capture prompt payment information required by 5 CFR 1315, including discounts taken, discounts|FSIO, PMD-37                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |lost, and interest paid.                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-19            |The system must provide the capability to record transactions (e.g., credit card transactions) where obligation|FSIO, PMD-42                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and payment occur simultaneously.                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-20            |The system must allow an authorized end user to record payments made on behalf of another agency, citing the   |FSIO, PMD-43                |VA                 |This currently does not apply to  |                                                      |
|                    |other agency’s funding information.                                                                            |                            |                   |NSF but may in the future         |                                                      |
|AP-04-22            |The system must record vendor credit memoranda as accounts receivable or negative accounts payable.            |FSIO, PMD-50                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-23            |The system must provide automated functionality that does the following:                                       |FSIO, PMD-51                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reduces payments to vendors to satisfy outstanding credit memos                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Records the collection for the amount offset                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reduces expenditures under the related obligation                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Maintains the balance of the credit for application against a future payment, if a credit is not fully       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |liquidated by one payment.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-24            |The system must provide the capability to record credit memo offsets against subsequent payments to the same   |FSIO, PMD-52                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |vendor from the same or a different funding source.                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-25            |The system must provide automated functionality that prevents agency offsets of payments based on              |FSIO, PMD-54                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |agency-defined criteria such as accounting classification elements, payee identifier, and vendor CCR business  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |type.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-26            |The system must provide automated functionality that, based on a single, online action, does the following:    |FSIO, PMD-55                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reverses an entire payment schedule or a single payment within a payment schedule                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reverses disbursement-in-transit entries                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reestablishes accounts payable                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Updates related payment records.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-27            |The system must provide automated functionality that, for payments that reference obligations in canceled      |FSIO, PMD-56                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |funds, inherits accounting and nonfinancial information from the original obligation document to a payment     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |request in the current year.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-28            |The system must provide the automated capability to select the appropriate third-party assignment name and     |FSIO, PMD-59                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |remittance address or banking information on manual payments to send to Treasury.                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-29            |The system must provide automated functionality that imports credit memo data from vendors based on the        |FSIO, PMD-60                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |standard Federal schema.                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-30            |The system must provide automated functionality that establishes a given credit memo to be used to offset      |FSIO, PMD-61                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |future payments or to be billed for subsequent collection.                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-31            |The system must provide the automated capability to reschedule payments that were previously included on a     |FSIO, PMD-62                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedule that was reversed.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-32            |The system must provide automated functionality that assigns a unique and sequential identifier (i.e., payment |FSIO, PMD-63                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |schedule number) to a payment schedule based on agency-defined business rules.                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-33            |The system must provide the capability to distinguish different types of payment schedules (e.g., travel       |FSIO, PMD-64                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payment schedules and vendor payment schedules), at an agency’s discretion.                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-34            |The system must provide the capability to identify payments that are reissued (i.e., previously canceled       |FSIO, PMD-65                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payments) and to evaluate the reason a reissued payment was previously canceled in order to determine whether  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |interest should be accrued and to properly calculate the interest.                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-04-35            |The system must provide automated functionality that allows an authorized certifying officer to exclude and    |FSIO, PMD-66                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |certify individual payment vouchers from the final payment schedule; and it must rewarehouse excluded payments.|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-05: Payment Follow-up                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|AP-05-01            |The system must maintain a history of the following information for each paid payment request:                 |FSIO, PME-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting classification elements                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Referenced obligation document number(s)                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Source document number(s) (e.g., reimbursable agreement number, BPA/BPA call number, contract number,        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |delivery/task order number, and grant number)                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total payment request amount                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• System-generated payment document number                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Treasury confirmation number                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee-assigned payment request number                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payee information (number, name, address, TIN, and DUNS (BPN) number)                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DUNS+4 number for CCR and FedReg payees                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment address(es) and/or bank account number(s) and routing number(s) to which payment(s) were made        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment method(s) (e.g., check, EFT)                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Payment amounts                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Interest paid                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Discount(s) taken                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Internal offset(s) made                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date(s) due                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Date(s) paid.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-05-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that enables third-party payments to be included on IRS        |FSIO, PME-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |1099-MISC forms.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|AP-05-03            |The system must provide automated functionality to notify employees of travel payments.                        |FSIO, PME-10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|Budget Execution                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|BE-01-01            |The system shall provide the capability to generate the SF 132 (OMB Apportionment and Reapportionment          |BFELOB, 5.01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Schedules).                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-02            |The system shall provide the capability to update the SF 132 (OMB Apportionment and Reapportionment Schedules).|BFELOB, 5.02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-03            |The system shall maintain SF 132 reports historically.                                                         |BFELOB, 5.03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-04            |The system shall support recording OMB action on submitted SF 132 Apportionment Requests and store electronic  |BFELOB, 5.05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |approvals.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-05            |The system shall support generation and printing of an SF 132 variance report comparing the NSF request to OMB |BFELOB: 5.06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |action.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-06            |The system shall produce reports that compare the Treasury Warrant to the SF 132 Apportionment. Note: Treasury |BFELOB, 5.07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Warrants originate in GWA.                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-07            |The system shall allow authorized users to apply SF 132 data as a baseline for calculations and to             |BFELOB: 5.09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |automatically replicate the previous apportionment.                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-08            |The system shall enable users to print/display all Appropriations with their latest Apportionment Request      |BFELOB, 5.10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |number.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-09            |The system shall manage the Advice of Allotment process.                                                       |BFELOB, 5.11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-10            |The system shall generate the Advice of Allotment.                                                             |BFELOB, 5.12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-11            |The system shall generate the Advice of Transfers (by appropriation).                                          |BFELOB, 5.13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-12            |The system shall have the ability to maintain allotted amounts over prescribed time periods using user-defined |BFELOB, 5.14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |algorithms. Examples of algorithms are: PY actual cost distribution, quarterly distribution, and monthly       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |distribution.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |Transfers.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |Transfers.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-15            |The system shall support review of the proposed direct and reimbursable work funding amounts for the Advice of |BFELOB, 5.17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Allotment.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-16            |The system shall provide the capability to report changes by Allottee.                                         |BFELOB, 5.18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-17            |The system shall summarize AFP and allotment amounts by Allottee for each appropriation.                       |BFELOB, 5.19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-18            |The system shall have the ability to create reports of appropriations, apportionments, allotted funds, and     |BFELOB, 5.20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |AFPs.                                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-19            |The system shall automatically make available electronic files of appropriations, apportionments, allotted     |BFELOB, 5.21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |funds, and AFPs data to the appropriate entity.                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-20            |The system shall prepare the formal documents of appropriations, apportionments, allotments, and AFPs          |BFELOB, 5.22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |automatically.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-21            |The system shall control funding within appropriations, apportionments, allotment, and AFPs.                   |BFELOB, 5.23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-22            |The system shall allow users to update Availability Footnote Codes (from SF 132) and create footnotes by       |BFELOB, 5.25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Treasury Symbol.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-23            |The system shall support management of AFPs.                                                                   |BFELOB: 5.27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-24            |The system shall generate documentation authorizing NSF program managers to obligate and expend funds.         |BFELOB, 5.28                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-25            |The system shall support electronic signatures on documents authorizing managers to obligate and expend funds. |BFELOB: 5.29                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-26            |The system shall generate funding authorizations. Examples are: M&O AFPs, Non-M&O AFPs, and Transfers.         |BFELOB, 5.30                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-27            |The system shall generate those information points shared by the Approved Funding Program (AFP) and the Work   |BFELOB, 5.31                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Authorization System (WAS) for the WAS Work Authorization and Work Proposal forms.                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-28            |The system shall summarize records to be uploaded into the accounting system. Records are for: appropriation,  |BFELOB, 5.32                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |apportionment, allotment, and AFP.                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-29            |The system shall allow adjusting control levels. Examples are: allotment and AFP.                              |BFELOB, 5.33                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-30            |The system shall allow users to update allotment and AFP codes. Examples are: B&R and accounting Flexfield.    |BFELOB, 5.34                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-31            |The system shall allow for operations under a CR.                                                              |BFELOB, 5.35                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-32            |The system shall allow processing of Congressional actions under a CR Availability Report. Examples are: House,|BFELOB, 5.36                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Senate, or Conference action.                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-33            |The system shall compute modified allotments under a CR.                                                       |BFELOB, 5.37                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-34            |The system shall track allotments and AFPs under a CR or similar situation.                                    |BFELOB, 5.38                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-35            |The system shall, under a CR, modify direct and reimbursable funding portions of all allotments at the AFP     |BFELOB, 5.39                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |recipient level.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-36            |The system shall provide users with alternative methods (ie - seasonal variations) in calculating CR           |BFELOB, 5.40                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |allowances.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-37            |The system shall allow Office of Budget users to initiate both an automated current rate of spending           |BFELOB, 5.41                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |calculation and a not-to-exceed-current-rate calculation under a CR.                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-38            |The system shall allow the Office of Budget to establish rules for CR terms. Examples of rules for each        |BFELOB, 5.42                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |appropriation are: lower of the House or Senate Mark, current rate, percent applied, and estimated obligation  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |through date.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-39            |The system shall have the ability to summarize/report current FY budget amount, PY actual, YTD actual, YTD     |BFELOB, 5.43                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |variance, and remaining FY budget at various user-defined levels/hierarchical structures.                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-40            |The system shall produce funds distribution reports.                                                           |BFELOB, 5.44                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-41            |The system shall generate the Estimated Unobligated Carryover Detail Report for submission to OMB.             |BFELOB, 5.45                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |of Budget.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |Recovery of Prior Year Obligations.                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |Code Reports for allotments, transfers, or AFPs.                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |Obligational Availability Report, and Recovery of Prior Year Deobligations by Appropriation and Program.       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-01-46            |The system shall distribute, slice and dice, and control funds from multiple perspectives. Examples are:       |BFELOB, 5.51                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |appropriation, budget structure, object class, apportionment, organization, allottee, allotment and            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |sub-allotment.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |levels/hierarchical structures. Examples are: organization, project, and program.                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |non-appropriated and non-apportioned funds.                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |repository amounts.                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |are monthly, fiscal year, and multi-year.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |shows variance percentage for month and YTD.                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
