|BE-02: Integrate Budget and Performance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|BE-02-01            |The system shall support importing a master spreadsheet of performance data into exhibits/tables.              |BFELOB, 6.01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-02            |The system shall maintain performance/workload data for the budget year and all prior years.                   |BFELOB, 6.02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-03            |The system shall have the ability to maintain performance targets and milestones for the budget year and ten   |BFELOB, 6.03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |future years.                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-04            |The system shall permit modifications to performance/workload data. Actions taken to adjust data must not      |BFELOB, 6.04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |impact the preserved snapshot.                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-05            |The system shall permit users to enter written commentary to explain changes to targets and variances between  |BFELOB, 6.05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |actual performance and target.                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-06            |The system shall have the ability to spread performance goal data by math function or user algorithm.          |BFELOB, 6.06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-07            |The system shall link the performance goals to NSF organizations and to the NSF Strategic Plan (Strategic      |BFELOB, 6.07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Themes and Objectives).                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-08            |The system shall enable development of the budget using varying levels of performance, such as outcome-related |BFELOB, 6.08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |performance, which is based on different funding levels. Examples of funding levels are: Decrement, Target, and|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Over Target.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-09            |The system shall provide the ability to support quantifiable performance measures.                             |BFELOB, 6.09                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-10            |The system shall support quarterly and annual performance reports.                                             |BFELOB, 6.10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-11            |The system shall provide the capability to design and produce ad hoc queries and customizable reports for      |BFELOB, 6.11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |individual users.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-12            |The system shall produce the annual Performance Results section in the PAR.                                    |BFELOB, 6.12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-13            |The system shall provide support for a flexible account structure.                                             |BFELOB, 6.13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-14            |The system shall enforce uniquely numbered performance goals.                                                  |BFELOB, 6.14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-15            |The system shall collect and report performance data to satisfy GPRA reporting requirements.                   |BFELOB, 6.15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-16            |The system shall support changes to performance measure information within any budget cycle.                   |BFELOB, 6.16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-17            |The system shall provide the capability to update any affected milestones, deliverables, or targets.           |BFELOB, 6.17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-18            |The system shall include the capability to create and maintain a performance measure hierarchy that supports   |BFELOB, 6.18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the roll up of data from the bottom up.                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-19            |The system must include the functionality to request modification to or new program element codes in iTRAK.    |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-20            |The system must provide the capability to assign a thematic to a program element code.                         |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-21            |The system must provide the capability for a qualified user to create thematic mapping, activity/subactivity   |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |line item mapping, as well as new BEP code strings in iTRAK.                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-22            |The system must provide the capability to produce a modifiable report based on agency pre-defined business     |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |rules showing the total amount obligated by thematic.                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-23            |The system must provide the capability for qualified users to reassign program element funding strings.        |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-24            |The system must provide the capability for qualified users to generate a report that shows obligations by      |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |thematic.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-25            |The system must have the capability to generate obligation summaries by strategic goal.                        |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-02-26            |The system must have the capability to generate percentages to allocate expenditures in SNC based on the spread|NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of the amount obligated per strategic goal and appropriation.                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03: Manage Workflow                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|BE-03-01            |The system shall control user access to functions and data based on workflow states.                           |BFELOB, 7.1                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-02            |The system shall require and record receipt of user acknowledgement of NSF guidance documents before user can  |BFELOB, 7.2                 |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |act on the guidance.                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-03            |The system shall permit online review and approvals.                                                           |BFELOB, 7.3                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-04            |The system shall have workflow automation incorporating routings and notifications.                            |BFELOB, 7.4                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-05            |The system shall support routing and notifications that target internal destinations.                          |BFELOB, 7.5a                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-06            |The system shall support routing and notifications that target external destinations.                          |BFELOB, 7.5b                |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-07            |The system shall have the ability to designate recipients.                                                     |BFELOB, 7.6                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-08            |The system shall support routing documents.                                                                    |BFELOB, 7.7                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-09            |The system shall have alerts for review and approval when deviations from guidance occur.                      |BFELOB, 7.8                 |VA                 |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-10            |The system shall record for audit all the changes to products within the workflow.                             |BFELOB, 7.9                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-11            |The system shall support flexible assignment of actions on workflow entities.                                  |BFELOB, 7.10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-12            |The system shall permit assignment of approval authority.                                                      |BFELOB, 7.11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-13            |The system shall have approval authority assignable at any budget structure level.                             |BFELOB, 7.12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-14            |The system shall have approval authority assignable to budget submission subsections.                          |BFELOB, 7.13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-15            |The system shall support job (batch) scheduling by various time-units. Examples of units are: calendar, clock, |BFELOB, 7.14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |interval, condition, and event-based.                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-16            |The system shall support concurrent review by multiple individuals and collaborative editing.                  |BFELOB, 7.15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-17            |The system shall support electronic signatures within the workflow process.                                    |BFELOB, 7.16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-18            |The system shall display any authorizing or certifying signature fields following the last data field requiring|BFELOB, 7.17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |an approval signature.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-19            |The system shall require that the data elements serving as an electronic signature are unique to each          |BFELOB, 7.18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |authorizing official.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-20            |The system shall include electronic signature approval in the audit trail associated with the data approval.   |BFELOB, 7.19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-21            |The system shall permit multiple levels of approval to a single user.                                          |BFELOB, 7.20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-22            |The system shall not prevent a user with multiple approval levels from applying more than one level of approval|BFELOB, 7.21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |to a given document.                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-23            |The system shall accommodate different organizational budget workflows.                                        |BFELOB, 7.22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-24            |The system shall allow an organization's system administrator to override predefined workflow processes within |BFELOB, 7.23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |that administrator's span of authority.                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-25            |The system shall support status queries and reports on items in the workflow.                                  |BFELOB, 7.24                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-26            |The system shall support viewing of approval history.                                                          |BFELOB, 7.25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-27            |The system shall have workflow capabilities by individual users and by user groups.                            |BFELOB, 7.26                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-28            |The system shall have the ability to lock out specific users or specific user groups during specified workflow |BFELOB, 7.27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |states.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-29            |The system shall lock down the finalized budget and its associated documents. Examples of documents are: Q&As, |BFELOB, 7.28                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |fact sheets, issue papers, and testimony.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-30            |The system shall have the ability to establish workflow tasks and deadlines.                                   |BFELOB, 7.29                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-31            |The system shall be capable of returning the user to where the user left off in the workflow process.          |BFELOB, 7.30                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-32            |The system shall allow the user to navigate to any previous point in the workflow.                             |BFELOB, 7.31                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-03-33            |The system shall provide mechanism to override the lock down of a budget submission under appropriate          |BFELOB, 7.32                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |circumstances.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04: Perform Analysis                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|BE-04-01            |The system shall support trend analysis based on standard and user-defined parameters.                         |BFELOB, 8.1                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-02            |The system shall allow input of outlay rates and calculate the outlays for any element of the budget structure.|BFELOB, 8.2                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-03            |The system shall produce forecasts for periodic bases with user-defined parameters. Examples are: cost of      |BFELOB, 8.3                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |living adjustments, outlays, and end-of-year projections of obligations.                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-04            |The system shall permit users to exclude selected budget line items, activities, or account codes from a       |BFELOB, 8.4                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |projection.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-05            |The system shall support regression analysis.                                                                  |BFELOB, 8.5                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-06            |The system shall allow multiple what-if scenarios based on any combination of business drivers and multiple    |BFELOB, 8.6                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |funding levels.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-07            |The system shall have the ability to copy any budget submission or what-if scenario into a new what-if         |BFELOB, 8.7                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |scenario.                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-08            |The system shall permit generation of unlimited what-if scenarios.                                             |BFELOB, 8.8                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-09            |The system shall permit creation of what-if scenarios without changing official records until the new scenario |BFELOB, 8.9                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |is authorized.                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-10            |The system shall be able to promote a what-if scenario as the next working version of budget submission.       |BFELOB, 8.10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-11            |The system shall be able to create scenarios that demonstrate impacts on performance.                          |BFELOB, 8.11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-12            |The system shall permit applying factors to specified budget values to project over-target or under-target     |BFELOB, 8.12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |estimates.                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-13            |The system shall comply with specified rounding rules.                                                         |BFELOB, 8.13                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-14            |The system shall have the ability to perform calculations based on system- and user-defined formulas.          |BFELOB, 8.14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-15            |The system shall permit the build of custom functions which can be globally available to all users.            |BFELOB, 8.15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-16            |The system shall allow a user to create and assign formulas to data fields, reference data and metadata fields.|BFELOB, 8.16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-17            |The system shall handle rollups of percentages and ratios on calculated columns.                               |BFELOB, 8.17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-18            |The system shall allow for changing current-year funding levels as a result of post-appropriation actions      |BFELOB, 8.18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |without change to enacted levels.                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-19            |The system shall support adding multiple funding levels to tables/exhibits while retaining the original        |BFELOB, 8.19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |tables/exhibits.                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-04-20            |The system must have the capability to calculate and assign taxes based on user-defined parameters.            |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05: Manage Data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|BE-05-01            |The system shall maintain data in a format to eliminate duplicate input and storage of information.            |BFELOB, 9.1                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-02            |The system shall use a common, integrated, fully attributed data dictionary that allows for the documentation  |BFELOB, 9.2                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of the specific use of fields and values.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-03            |The system shall have the ability to archive historical data.                                                  |BFELOB, 9.3                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-04            |The system shall auto-archive historical data based on user-defined rules.                                     |BFELOB, 9.4                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-05            |The system shall ensure timely and reliable access to data.                                                    |BFELOB, 9.5                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-06            |The system shall support data searches.                                                                        |BFELOB, 9.6                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-07            |The system shall ensure data integrity.                                                                        |BFELOB, 9.7                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-08            |The system shall support validation of imported data.                                                          |BFELOB, 9.8                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-09            |The system shall maintain a history of changes to tracked elements. Examples are: old values, new values, and  |BFELOB, 9.9                 |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |user identifiers.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-10            |The system shall have the ability to update actual cost data regularly from Treasury GWA.                      |BFELOB, 9.10                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-11            |The system shall support reconciliation reporting. Examples are: budget spreads across appropriation funds,    |BFELOB, 9.11                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |programs, activities, object classes, sub-activities, and performance goals.                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-12            |The system shall provide a single point of entry for data.                                                     |BFELOB, 9.12                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-13            |The system shall prevent damage of system data from simultaneous changes.                                      |BFELOB, 9.14                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-14            |The system shall validate that budget data embedded within a narrative corresponds to budget data in the       |BFELOB, 9.15                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |central database.                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-15            |The system shall support reporting information about where federal funds for scientific research are spent.    |BFELOB, 9.16                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-16            |The system shall make available a snapshot on demand, after every submission phase.                            |BFELOB, 9.17                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-17            |The system shall retain snapshots independently of one another.                                                |BFELOB, 9.18                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-18            |Subsequent data edits shall not impact existing snapshots.                                                     |BFELOB, 9.19                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-19            |The system shall maintain version control on all portions of the budget.                                       |BFELOB, 9.20                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-20            |The system shall record user ID, date stamps, and time stamps for modified records.                            |BFELOB, 9.21                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-21            |The system shall support check-out and check-in for document editing.                                          |BFELOB, 9.22                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-22            |The system shall allow multiple users to work on different sections within the same budget submission.         |BFELOB, 9.23                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-23            |The system shall permit read-only access to any previous version of the budget submission.                     |BFELOB, 9.24                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-24            |The system shall allow for unlimited versions of a submission, section, or element.                            |BFELOB, 9.25                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-25            |The system shall have the ability to set version labels on controlled elements for grouping and point-in-time  |BFELOB, 9.26                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |referencing.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-26            |The system shall establish and dynamically control user access to specified data at different times by budget  |BFELOB, 9.27                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |version while still allowing read access.                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-27            |The system shall allow users to see who has documents checked out.                                             |BFELOB, 9.28                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-28            |The system shall report on elements under version control. Examples of reportable items are: Element Name,     |BFELOB, 9.29                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Version Number (#), Check-Out Date, Check-In Date, User, Version Label, Justifications, and Comments.          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-29            |The system shall support multiple data types to align with the budget structure for the annual budget          |BFELOB, 9.30                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |justification document. Examples are: graphic, pictorial, narrative, and numeric data and graphs and tables as |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |objects.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-30            |The system shall support validation tables to apply to any data elements.                                      |BFELOB, 9.31                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-31            |The system shall support optional justification text when a single numeric element is changed.                 |BFELOB, 9.32                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-32            |The system shall support data validation via system look-up tables.                                            |BFELOB, 9.33                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|BE-05-33            |The system will neither collect nor store privacy data.                                                        |BFELOB, 9.34                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|Cost Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|CM-01-01            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain cost data objects to be used for the          |FSIO, CMA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |accumulation, distribution, and reporting of costs.                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that accumulates costs by cost object and that enables costs   |FSIO, CMA-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |incurred in the generation of revenue to be reported in association with that revenue.                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-03            |The system must provide the capability to associate the purchase of fixed assets and inventory and the payment |FSIO, CMA-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |of advances with related cost objects so that subsequent expenditures are identified by cost object.           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-04            |The system must provide the capability to accumulate direct costs, indirect cost allocations, implicit costs   |FSIO, CMA-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(e.g., costs of pensions provided by other government agencies), and unfunded costs (e.g., accrued annual leave|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |costs) by cost object.                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that accumulates nonfinancial data (e.g., units purchased,     |FSIO, CMA-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |units sold) by cost object at the transaction level.                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that accumulates, distributes, and reports both planned and    |FSIO, CMA-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |actual costs by cost object.                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-07            |The system must provide the automated capability to accumulate and report costs by accounting classification   |FSIO, CMA-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |element and by specific customers, vendors, reimbursable agreements, contracts, BPAs, task orders, work orders,|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and grants.                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-08            |The system must provide the capability to create and manage master projects that are comprised of multiple     |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |subprojects.                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-09            |The system must provide the capability to allocate costs to a master project.                                  |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-01-10            |The system must provide the capability to allocate costs from a master project to its sub-projects.            |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-02: Cost Distribution                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|CM-02-01            |The system must provide the capability to distribute and assign the full cost of goods and services to cost    |FSIO, CMB-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |objects.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-02-02            |The system must provide the capability to associate the USSGL attributes captured on expense and expenditure   |FSIO, CMB-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions with cost assignment transactions, so that they can be used in the preparation of the Statement of|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Net Cost. For example, costs assigned to programs reported on the Statement of Net Cost must be able to be     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |distinguished by the USSGL attribute classifications of Federal/non-Federal, exchange/non-exchange, and        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |custodial/non-custodial.                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-02-03            |The system must provide automated functionality to perform agency-defined multilayered cost distributions (at  |FSIO, CMB-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |least three levels of distribution) using multiple rates and fixed-amount allocation methods.                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-02-04            |The system must provide automated functionality that redistributes costs based on revised rates and allocation |FSIO, CMB-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |amounts.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-02-05            |As USSGL requirements evolve, the system must have the capability to update the USSGL to remain compliant with |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |applicable Federal requirements.                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-03: Cost Monitoring                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|CM-03-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates a comparative income statement by cost object   |FSIO, CMC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |using the following parameters:                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cost object                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting period (current year and prior year).                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The report must display the month and year-to-date activity for the cost object compared to the prior year’s   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |month and year-to-date activity. The report must list the following data for each accounting period column and |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |year-to-date column:                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Revenue                                                                                                      |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Direct expenses                                                                                              |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Indirect expenses                                                                                            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Total expenses                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Net revenue/cost                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-03-02            |The report must display the month and year-to-date activity for the cost object compared to the prior year’s   |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |month and year-to-date activity. The report must list the following data for each accounting period column and |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |year-to-date column:                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reimbursable/Non-Reimbursable                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-03-03            |The system must provide the capability to generate a cost object income statement using the following          |FSIO, CMC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |parameters:                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Cost object                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accounting period (current year and prior year).                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |The report must display revenue, direct cost, and indirect cost assigned to the cost object for the accounting |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |period.                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|CM-03-04            |The system must maintain an audit trail of cost assignment transactions from their origin to the final cost    |FSIO, CMC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |objects.                                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|Reimbursable Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|Req ID #                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|RM-01-01            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain an agency-assigned customer identifier for    |FSIO, RBA-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Federal customers.                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-01-02            |The system must provide the capability to establish and maintain an agency-assigned payee identifier for       |FSIO, RBA-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |Federal payees.                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-01-03            |The system must maintain customer and payee (Federal trading partner) data from FedReg, which requires fully   |FSIO, RBA-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |supporting all FedReg data formats. For example, system data types must be consistent with FedReg data types,  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |and system field lengths must be equal to or greater than FedReg field lengths.                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-01-04            |The system must interface customer and payee data from FedReg no less frequently than daily.                   |FSIO, RBA-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-01-05            |The system must provide the capability to prevent unauthorized users from manually updating customer and payee |FSIO, RBA-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |data that originated in FedReg.                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-02: Establishment of Reimbursable Agreement                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

|                    |following:                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Reimbursable agreement number                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |• Accounting classification information                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |following:                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Period of performance                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03: Billing, Collections, and Payments under Reimbursable Agreements                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|RM-03-01            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines amounts to be billed consistent with           |FSIO, RBC-01                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reimbursable agreement billing terms, including the following:                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Percentage of work completed                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Accrued expenditures                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Actual costs incurred (direct and indirect)                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-02            |The system must provide automated functionality that determines amounts to be billed consistent with           |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reimbursable agreement billing terms, including the following:                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Advances                                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-03            |The system must provide automated functionality that monitors the cumulative amount billed for a given         |FSIO, RBC-02                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reimbursable agreement and applies the agency-defined validation edits (reject further attempts to bill, or    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |warn the user) when the authorized amount (i.e., billing limit) on the reimbursable agreement has been or is   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |about to be exceeded.                                                                                          |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-04            |The system must provide automated functionality that records revenue collected under a reimbursable            |FSIO, RBC-03                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |(interagency) agreement and updates the earned revenue balance on the reimbursable agreement.                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-05            |The system must provide automated functionality that records advances (unearned revenue) received under        |FSIO, RBC-04                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |reimbursable agreements and updates the advance balances of the reimbursable agreements.                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-06            |The system must provide automated functionality that records a refund payable when advances collected exceed   |FSIO, RBC-05                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |the amount expended or billed on a reimbursable agreement after all work is performed and that updates the     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |advance balances of reimbursable agreements.                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-07            |The system must have the capability to capture data related to intragovernmental transactions (e.g., IPAC      |FSIO, RBC-06                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions), including the following:                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Interagency agreement number                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Voucher number                                                                                               |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• USSGL comments with Treasury system (e.g., IPAC) disbursement and collection transactions                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender/originator TAS                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender ALC                                                                                                   |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender USSGL account                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender BETC                                                                                                  |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender DO symbol                                                                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender DUNS number                                                                                           |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Sender DUNS+4 number                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer/receiver TAS                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer ALC                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer USSGL account                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer DUNS number                                                                                         |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer DUNS+4 number                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer BETC                                                                                                |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Customer department code                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-08            |The system must have the capability to capture data related to intragovernmental transactions (e.g., IPAC      |NSF Requirement             |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions), including the following:                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Period of availability                                                                                       |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Invoice #                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Obligation #                                                                                                 |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Control #                                                                                                    |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• Miscellaneous (e.g. - accounting string)                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |• DoDAC                                                                                                        |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-09            |The system must provide automated functionality that generates and exports bulk files for intragovernmental    |FSIO, RBC-07                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |payments and collections in the formats required by Treasury systems that perform intragovernmental            |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |transactions (e.g., IPAC).                                                                                     |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |
|RM-03-10            |The system must provide the capability to validate FedReg information required for generating the bulk file for|FSIO, RBC-08                |M                  |                                  |                                                      |
|                    |intragovernmental payments and collections (e.g., IPAC bulk file).                                             |                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|                    |and recorded in the Treasury system that performs intragovernmental disbursements and collections (e.g., IPAC).|                            |                   |                                  |                                                      |

|IA-01: Interagency Agreements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|IA-01-01         |The system must provide the capability to capture a standard Incoming Interagency Agreement (IAA) # at the Treasury|NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |level, in order for agencies to maintain one single IAA #.                                                         |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-02         |The system must provide the capability to capture the following data elements, as detailed in the Treasury FMS Form|NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |7600B, Interagency Agreements, Order Requirements and Funding Information (Order) Section:                         |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
