|                 |- IAA #                                                                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Primary Organization/Office Information                                                                          |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Order/Requirements Information                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Funding Modification Summary by Line                                                                             |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Performance Period                                                                                               |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Order Line/Funding Information                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Advance Information                                                                                              |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Total Net Order Amount                                                                                           |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Attachments                                                                                                      |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Payment Method                                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Billing Frequency                                                                                                |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Payment Terms                                                                                                    |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Funding Clauses/Instructions                                                                                     |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Delivery/Shipping Information for Products                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Approvals and Contact Information (Program Officials)                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Approvals and Contact Information (Funding Officials)                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Contact Information (Finance Office)                                                                             |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Contact Information (Additional Points of Contacts)                                                              |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-03         |The system must provide the capability to capture the following data elements, as detailed in the Treasury FMS Form|NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |7600B, Interagency Agreements, General Terms and Conditions (GT&C) Section:                                        |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- IAA #                                                                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Department and/or Agency                                                                                         |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Servicing Agency Agreement Tracking Number                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Assisted Acquisition Agreement                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- GT&C Action                                                                                                      |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Agreement Period                                                                                                 |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Recurring Agreement                                                                                              |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Agreement Type                                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Are Advance Payments Allowed for this IAA                                                                        |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Estimated Agreement Amount                                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Statutory Authority                                                                                              |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Requesting Agency's Scope                                                                                        |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Roles and Responsibilities for the Requesting Agency and Servicing Agency                                        |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Restrictions                                                                                                     |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Assisted Acquisition Small Business Credit Clause                                                                |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Disputes                                                                                                         |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Termination                                                                                                      |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Assisted Acquisition Agreements - Requesting Agency's Organizations Authorized To Request Acquisition Assistance |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |for this IAA                                                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Assisted Acquisition Agreements - Servicing Agency's Organizations Authorized To Provide Acquisition Assistance  |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |for this IAA                                                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Requesting Agency Clause(s)                                                                                      |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Servicing Agency Clause(s)                                                                                       |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Additional Requesting Agency and/or Servicing Agency Attachments                                                 |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Annual Review of IAA                                                                                             |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Agency Official                                                                                                  |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-04         |The system must provide the capability to capture the following additional data elements:                          | NSF Requirement        |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Tax ID                                                                                                           |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Fiscal Year Funds Appropriated                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Billing Method through IPAC (Reimbursement, Advance payment)                                                     |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Period of Performance                                                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Funds Expiration Date                                                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Funds Cancellation Date                                                                                          |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-05         |The system shall maintain and update the Agency Locator Code (ALC) as part of the master Federal vendor record.    |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-06         |The system shall provide the capability to select an ALC from a drop-down list when completing an Interagency      |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |Agreement.                                                                                                         |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-07         |The system shall automatically populate additional data fields upon selection of an ALC, including:                |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Vendor Name / ID                                                                                                 |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Institution ID                                                                                                   |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |- Trading Partner (TP)                                                                                             |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-08         |The system shall maintain and update (manually) and provide the capability to select a Treasury Account Symbol     |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |(TAS) from a drop-down list when completing an Interagency Agreement.                                              |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-09         |The system shall prevent the user from committing or obligating additional funds without extending the agreement if|NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |funds are canceled or expired .                                                                                    |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|IA-01-10         |The system should have the capability to capture whether an agreement is flagged as an advance or reimbursement    |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |billing during the commitment stage.                                                                               |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|Grants Management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|Req ID #         |Requirement                                                                                                        |Source                  |Mandatory or           |Software Meets Requirement Out of |Comments                                              |
|                 |                                                                                                                   |                        |Value-Added            |the Box? (Yes or No)              |                                                      |
|GN: Grants Requirements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|GN-01-01         |The system must provide the ability to post negative cash request to award as a receivable. Anything posted as a   |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |receivable should be transferred to receivables module for collection. See receivables process flow and            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |requirements for additional information.                                                                           |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-02         |The system must allow the authorized end user to edit the payment file or delete transactions prior to submission  |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |of the file to Treasury                                                                                            |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-03         |The system must provide the ability to adjust the existing receivable based on the net effect of the adjustment to |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |the closed grant. Any adjustment to the receivable should be reflected in the receivables  module for collection.  |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|                 |See receivables process flow and requirements for additional information.                                          |                        |                       |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-04         |The system shall allow authorized end users the ability to cancel grants before the date of expiration             |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-05         |The system shall have the capability to hold open a grant for a configurable period of time (ie one quarter)       |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-06         |The system must have the ability to restrict payments against specific obligations                                 |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|GN-01-07         |The system must allow authorized users the ability to manually update the payee information file.                  |NSF Requirement         |M                      |                                  |                                                      |
|Financial System Reporting Requirements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|Master ID #       |Requirement Description                                                                                           |Source                   |Mandatory or Value    |Software Meets Requirement Out of |Comments                                              |
|                  |                                                                                                                  |                         |Added                 |the Box? (Yes or No)              |                                                      |
|RP-01: FSIO Reporting Requirements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|RP-01-01          |The system must process scheduled work (e.g., batch jobs) within an agency-specified batch-processing window.     |FSIO, TLL-02             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Scheduled work can include the following:                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Daily systems assurance reports                                                                                 |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Daily backups                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Daily interface processing                                                                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• General ledger transaction posting                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Table updates                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Standard reporting.                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-02          |The system must deliver the following ad hoc query interface features:                                            |FSIO, TLJ-11             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Graphical display of data sources                                                                               |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Ability to point and click on selectable table, data, and link objects for inclusion in a custom query          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Active data dictionary to provide users with object definitions.                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-03          |The system must provide the capability to preview a query, form, report, or other result before printing.         |FSIO, TLJ-09             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-04          |The system must process submitted queries and queue output online for access by authorized users.                 |FSIO, TLJ-03             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-05          |The system must provide the capability to define parameter-based query scripts that can be queued for execution,  |FSIO, TLJ-02             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |stored for reuse, and shared with other authorized agency users.                                                  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-06          |The system must deliver an integrated ad hoc query capability to support agency access to and analysis of         |FSIO, TLJ-01             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |system-maintained financial data.                                                                                 |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-07          |The system must deliver an event logging capability for systems, transactions, tables, and system parameters. The |FSIO, TLI-09             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |logs must include the following information:                                                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• User ID                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• System date                                                                                                     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Time                                                                                                            |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Type of activity (addition, modification, deletion)                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Old value                                                                                                       |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• New value.                                                                                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |For example, the system must provide a log of all attempts to log on to the system or track changes to the prompt |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |pay interest rate value.                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-08          |The system must deliver a process scheduling capability that allows the agency to define, initiate, monitor, and  |FSIO, TLI-01             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |stop system processes (e.g., online availability, batch jobs, and system maintenance).                            |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-09          |The system must ensure that the management, operations, and technical baseline security controls are implemented  |FSIO, TLH-02             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |in accordance with current FIPS 199, Standards for Security Categorization of Federal Information and Information |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Systems, and other current NIST guidance on selecting the appropriate security controls.                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-10          |The system must deliver the capability to control function access (e.g., system modules, transactions, and        |FSIO, TLH-03             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |approval authorities) and data access (create, read, update, delete) by assigned attribute:                       |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• User ID                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Functional role (e.g., payable technician)                                                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Organization.                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |The system also must enable the agency to define access rules based on any combination of these attributes.       |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-11          |The system must consistently enforce the appropriate security controls in all modules, including software used for|FSIO, TLH-04             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |ad hoc data query/report generators.                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-12          |The system must provide the capability to restrict access to sensitive data elements, such as social security     |FSIO, TLH-05             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |numbers, banking information by user ID, assigned role, or organization.                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-13          |The system must support secure Internet access to the integrated ad hoc data query facility.                      |FSIO, TLG-04             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-14          |The system must provide the capability to parse XML.                                                              |FSIO, TLD-09             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-15          |The system must generate output reports, query results, and data files using multiple formats as specified by     |FSIO, TLA-04             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |functional requirements. Specified formats can include online display, printed report, PDF, MS Word, Excel, ASCII,|                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |or delimited text file. If an output format is not specified within a requirement, the requested information must |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |be viewable to the agency online, using the API.                                                                  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-16          |The system must provide automated functionality to query document additions, modifications, and cancellations     |FSIO, SME-03             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |using query parameters, including the following:                                                                  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• User ID                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Document number                                                                                                 |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Document type                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Change type (addition, modification, cancelation)                                                               |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Transaction date range                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Accounting period.                                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Query results must include all parameter values, document numbers, and date and time stamps.                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-17          |The system must provide automated report, drill-down, and query capabilities for documents. The selection         |FSIO, SMC-12             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |parameters must include any one or a combination of the following:                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Document type                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Document status (e.g., open, closed)                                                                            |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee identifier                                                                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee DUNS+4 number                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Customer identifier                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Accounting classification elements.                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Result must be a list of selected document numbers with document statuses and balances at the document level. The |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |result must include drill-down from document lines to accounting lines and then to the related detailed general   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |ledger transactions.                                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-18          |The system must provide the automated capability to query document accounting data using query parameters that    |FSIO, RPB-06             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |must include all standard and agency-defined accounting classification elements. Result is a list of selected     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |document accounting lines that display the document number, accounting classification elements, and accounting    |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |line amounts. The system also must enable drill-down from accounting lines to general ledger transaction details, |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |including transaction numbers, transaction and system dates, and debits and credits.                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-19          |The system must provide the automated capability to query the payee information maintenance file using query      |FSIO, RPC-01             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |parameters, including the following:                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee identifier                                                                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee name (legal)                                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee name (DBA)                                                                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee name (division)                                                                                           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Payee TIN                                                                                                       |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• DUNS number                                                                                                     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• IRS 1099 indicator.                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |The result must display all payee data for the specified payee. Output options include an Excel-formatted data    |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |file.                                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-20          |The system must deliver the capability to download selected query data and to reformat downloaded query           |FSIO, TLJ-08             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |information for direct access by common desktop applications (e.g., spreadsheet, ASCII text, and comma-delimited  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |text).                                                                                                            |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-21          |The system must provide automated functionality to generate a status of funds report for each allotment recorded  |FSIO, RPB-10             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |by the agency using accounting period and one or more other accounting classification elements as parameters. The |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |report must display the following information for each allotment recorded by the agency:                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Accounting classification elements                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total allotment                                                                                                 |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Commitments                                                                                                     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Obligations                                                                                                     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Upward adjustments                                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Expenditures                                                                                                    |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Available balance.                                                                                              |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |The system must ensure that the available balance equals the general ledger balance in the 4610, 4620, or 4650    |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |account. Amounts should be cumulative from the beginning of the fiscal year through the accounting period         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |specified. If reporting for the current period, amounts must be cumulative up through the current date.           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-01-22          |The system must provide automated functionality that generates an FMS 224 transaction detail report using         |FSIO, RPG-03             |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |accounting period as a parameter. The report must list the detailed transactions supporting each TAS total        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |reported in each section of the FMS 224. Detailed transactions must include the following:• ALC• TAS• Transaction |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |amount• Confirmation date• Transaction document number or Treasury document number.The report must provide        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |separate report totals for disbursement and receipt activity by ALC and TAS.                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02: Standard COTS Reporting Requirements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|RP-02-01          |The system shall produce an audit trail report of all transactions processed during a specified period that       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |includes related data such as: U.S. SGL accounts, accounting classification codes, transaction types, document    |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |number, postings and effective dates, etc.                                                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-02          |The system shall provide the ability to produce an on-line current status of funds report down to the lowest level|Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |of the accounting classification structure, including: -annual budget (including revisions- outstanding or total  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |appropriations, apportionments, allotments, etc.                                                                  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-03          |The system shall provide the capability to save and retrieve report parameters, i.e., to re-create reports that   |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |were previously generated based on user-defined criteria.                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-04          |The system shall produce an invoice status report by invoice type to track invoice processing.                    |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-05          |The system shall provide capability to allow reports to be run in the background while other system processing    |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |takes place.                                                                                                      |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-06          |The system shall provide the capability to report on aged requisitions.                                           |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-07          |The system shall provide the capability to report on aged outstanding obligating document by entry date.          |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-08          |The system shall provide the capability to report on aged outstanding obligating document by expected receipt     |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |date.                                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-09          |The system shall provide the capability to report on aged receiving reports without an acceptance.                |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-10          |The system shall provide the capability to report on aged, unmatched vendor invoices.                             |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-11          |The system shall have the ability to allow specific users to view limited data over the intranet.                 |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-12          |The system shall have the ability to allow specific users to query on limited data over the intranet.             |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-13          |The system shall have the ability to allow specific users to run reports on limited data over the intranet.       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-14          |The system shall provide the capability to download data to spreadsheets.                                         |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-15          |The system shall provide the capability to download data to databases.                                            |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-16          |The system shall provide the capability to download data to analytical tools.                                     |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-17          |The system shall provide all mandatory external reporting in required formats.                                    |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-18          |The system shall allow for online viewing of the entire report.                                                   |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-19          |The system shall allow for online viewing of a partial report.                                                    |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-20          |The system shall allow for printing of a partial report to a user-specified printer.                              |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-21          |The system shall allow for printing of an entire report to a user-specified printer.                              |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-22          |The system shall allow data to be presented in a relational structure so that data can be extracted across        |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |organizations by attribute.                                                                                       |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-23          |The system shall allow data to be able to be drilled-down through multiple layers of data.                        |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-24          |The system shall provide the capability to produce comparative reports.                                           |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-25          |The system shall provide the capability to produce analytical reports.                                            |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-26          |The system shall provide the capability to produce trend reports.                                                 |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-27          |The system shall allow reports to be queued for production at a later time.                                       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-28          |The system shall allow queries using wildcards and advanced query features.                                       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-29          |The system shall allow for wildcards to be used when selecting parameters for Report production                   |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-30          |The system shall provide the capability to provide real-time status for funds submitted.                          |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-31          |The system shall provide the capability to provide real-time status for funds obligated.                          |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-32          |The system shall provide the capability to provide real-time status for funds committed.                          |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-33          |The system shall provide authorized funds reports at various accounting code structure levels based on            |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |user-defined parameters.                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-34          |The system shall provide authorized funds inquiries at various accounting code structure levels based on          |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |user-defined parameters.                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-35          |The system shall allow the use of alternative formats across organizational units.                                |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-36          |The system shall allow the use of alternative formats across program units.                                       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-37          |The system shall allow the use of alternative formats across project units.                                       |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-38          |The system shall have the ability to recreate reports using the post-date.                                        |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-39          |The system shall have the ability to recreate reports using the system date.                                      |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-40          |The system shall have the ability to retrieve data by a partial record for inquiries.                             |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-41          |The system shall have the ability to retrieve data by a complete record for inquiries.                            |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-42          |The system shall have the ability to retrieve data by a partial record for reports.                               |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-43          |The system shall have the ability to retrieve data by a complete record for reports.                              |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-44          |The system shall allow what-if scenarios for showing statistical data in different organizational structures.     |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-45          |The system shall provide a report depicting what-if analysis of consolidations of financial data prior to         |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |submitting the consolidation.                                                                                     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-02-46          |The system shall generate an on-line report to show unposted entries.                                             |Standard COTS            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-04: Program Office Functionality Requirements                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|RP-04-01          |The system shall allow for a qualified user to change a program reference code after an award has been made.      |Program Office           |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-05: NSF Reports                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|RP-05-04          |The system must have the capability to generate an Award Closeout Audit Report. This report shows the awards      |Legacy system            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |(grants) by grant accountant that were closed in the financial system.  The FUB amounts indicate the Final        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Unliquidated Balance which would equal a deobligation. The report should capture the following data elements:     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Columns-                                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Obligation Number                                                                                               |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Amount                                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Message                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Rows-                                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Grant Account                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• State                                                                                                           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Reporting Institution                                                                                           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Award ID                                                                                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Fund Unliquidated Balance amount                                                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Subtotals-                                                                                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the Reporting Institution                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the State                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the Grant Account                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-05-05          |The system must have the capability to generate an Award Closeout Error Report.  Federal Cash Transaction Report –|Legacy system            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Final Unliquidated Obligations Error Report. Displays all open awards when action is pending.  This report would  |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |only generate if there was an issue with the 035-FUB processing. The report should capture the following data     |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |elements:                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Columns-                                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Obligation Number                                                                                               |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Amount                                                                                                          |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Message                                                                                                         |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Rows-                                                                                                             |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Grant Account                                                                                                   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• State                                                                                                           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Reporting Institution                                                                                           |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Award ID                                                                                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Fund Unliquidated Balance amount                                                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |Subtotals-                                                                                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the Reporting Institution                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the State                                                |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |• Total number of awards and the FUB Total processed for the Grant Account                                        |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
|RP-05-08          |The system must have the capability to generate a report characterized by Appropriation where BEP amount available|Legacy system            |M                     |                                  |                                                      |
|                  |exceeds Allotment amount available.  The report shows Appropriations where BEP amount available is greater than   |                         |                      |                                  |                                                      |
